translation.en: [woman] Some people gravitate towards no.
translation.zh: 有些人倾向于说“不”

translation.en: Some people naturally lean towards yes.
translation.zh: 有些人则天生就倾向于说“好”

translation.en: I said yes to everything.
translation.zh: 我对一切都说了“好”

translation.en: I'm up! Yes!
translation.zh: 我起来了！好！

translation.en: Come on! Hop on!
translation.zh: 来吧！ 上车吧！

translation.en: [laughs] Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: -Allison? -[Allison] And when I met Carlos…
translation.zh: -艾莉森？-当我遇见卡洛斯时…

translation.en: -You're Allison? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你是艾莉森吗？-对

translation.en: I think I got your coffee. I took a sip. You mind?
translation.zh: 这好像是你的咖啡我喝了一口 你介意吗？

translation.en: [Allison] …it was like finding a partner in yes.
translation.zh: 感觉就像是找到了我的“好”搭档

translation.en: -Arepa pabellón. -Arepa parió.
translation.zh: -帕贝隆玉米饼-帕利欧玉米饼

translation.en: -Pabellón. Yeah. -Pabellón. Yeah.
translation.zh: -帕贝隆-帕贝隆 -对-好

translation.en: Hey, should we play hooky and go to the beach?
translation.zh: 嘿 我们要不要翘班去海滩玩？

translation.en: [muffled] Yes! I'm ready.
translation.zh: 好！我准备好了

translation.en: -You think? Yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你这么觉得吗？-对

translation.en: Do you wanna meet my parents?
translation.zh: 你想见见我父母吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I wanna meet your parents.
translation.zh: 好啊 我当然想见你父母了

translation.en: Wanna go rock climbing?
translation.zh: 要去攀岩吗？

translation.en: -[Allison yells] -[Carlos] Allison!
translation.zh: 艾莉森！

translation.en: I'm coming! Carlos! Carlos!
translation.zh: 我来了 卡洛斯！

translation.en: I'm coming. Come here. Come. Come.
translation.zh: 我来了 过来吧

translation.en: [Allison] Yes was like the theme of our relationship.
translation.zh: “好”就像是我俩关系的主题

translation.en: -Allison, do you take Carlos-- -Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: -艾莉森 你愿意嫁给卡洛斯…-好 我愿意！

translation.en: -[officiant] Carlos, do you take-- -Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: -卡洛斯 你愿意娶…-好 当然愿意！

translation.en: [Allison] And although having kids is the best thing that's ever happened to us…
translation.zh: 虽然有了孩子是我们此生最大的幸福

translation.en: [Allison] …no became the new yes.
translation.zh: “好”渐渐被“不”取代了

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 不行！

translation.en: -[kids] Four, three, two, one. -[Allison] No, no, no, no. No, no, no, no.
translation.zh: -四、三、二、一-不行！

translation.en: But no is part of the job.
translation.zh: 但说“不”是妈妈的部分职责

translation.en: No is the light.
translation.zh: “不”是真理

translation.en: -No is the answer. -Hey! No! No, no, no!
translation.zh: “不”是答案 嘿！不行！

translation.en: Come on! Layla's parents let her!
translation.zh: 蕾拉的父母让她这么做耶！

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Ah-ah-ah. No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: Okay, guys, screen time's over.
translation.zh: 好了 大家 屏幕时间结束了

translation.en: -Wait, no, no. Wait. Five more minutes. -Nope.
translation.zh: -不 等一下 多五分钟-不行

translation.en: Hey! Mom! Mom, Mom. Mom, Mom!
translation.zh: 嘿！妈！

translation.en: [Allison] Saying no 50 times an hour?
translation.zh: 一小时说50次“不”？

translation.en: No! Absolutely not!
translation.zh: 不行！绝对不行！

translation.en: Nope on a rope!
translation.zh: 想都别想！

translation.en: Nando?
translation.zh: 南多？

translation.en: Katie, you're kidding me. You've done half of your homework.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 你在开玩笑吧？你的作业只写了一半

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不行！

translation.en: No way, no how, not by a long shot,
translation.zh: 不行、没门、根本没可能

translation.en: under no circumstances, not in a million years, no!
translation.zh: 在任何情况下即使天塌下来也不行！

translation.en: [Allison] It's called parenting.
translation.zh: 这叫做为人父母

translation.en: Hey, Cheryl, how's it going? Good morning.
translation.zh: 嘿 雪莉  你好吗？早上好

translation.en: Hey, listen, I have a quick question.
translation.zh: 听着 我想问你件事

translation.en: Um, I have a job interview this afternoon.
translation.zh: 我今天下午有工作面试

translation.en: I was wondering if you could take Ellie for a couple of hours after school?
translation.zh: 不知道放学后你能不能帮我照看爱丽几个小时？

translation.en: What about the Girl Scouts?
translation.zh: 女童子军饼干怎么了？

translation.en: Okay, put us down for three boxes of Samoas.
translation.zh: 好吧 给我们留三盒萨摩亚饼干

translation.en: Tagalongs? Who likes Tagalongs?
translation.zh: 花生酱馅饼？谁喜欢那东西啊？

translation.en: Okay, put me down. Ten boxes.
translation.zh: 好吧 给我留十盒吧

translation.en: Cheryl Nelson is shaking me down.
translation.zh: 雪莉尼尔森在敲诈我呢

translation.en: Yep, I'll… I'll wait.
translation.zh: 好 我等着

translation.en: Mom? Fleekfest? Dad said he's okay with me going if you are.
translation.zh: 妈？闪光音乐节？ 爸说只要你同意让我去 他就同意

translation.en: Oh, he did?
translation.zh: 他这么说的？

translation.en: Wait, you're going to a freak fest?
translation.zh: 等等 你要去参加傻瓜音乐节啊？

translation.en: Awesome. You can finally be with your people.
translation.zh: 太棒了 你终于能和同类在一起了

translation.en: It's called Fleekfest. It's a music festival. It's cool.
translation.zh: 是闪光音乐节 是个很酷的音乐节

translation.en: I guess if you think it's cool, I'm sure it's super cool.
translation.zh: 你觉得很酷的话那肯定超级无敌霹雳酷吧

translation.en: -Did you hear what I asked? -Yeah, you're 14.
translation.zh: -你听到我问什么了吗？-小姐 你才14岁

translation.en: You can't go without a parent.
translation.zh: 没父母陪同你不能去

translation.en: Hi. You can? I'll put a blue note and the check in her backpack. Thank you.
translation.zh: 嗨 可以吧？ 我会把蓝色纸条和支票放在她的背包里 谢谢

translation.en: Nobody wants to go to a music festival with their parent.
translation.zh: 没人想和自己的父母一起去音乐节

translation.en: Dad, please help! Mom.
translation.zh: 爸 拜托跟妈说一下

translation.en: What… What? She said no?
translation.zh: 怎么啦？她说不行吗？

translation.en: If your mother says no, it's no, sweetie.
translation.zh: 你妈说不行就不行了 亲爱的

translation.en: Really? Don't you mean if we say no?
translation.zh: 是吗？不是“我们说不行”吗？

translation.en: Guys? Watch this.
translation.zh: 大家 看好了

translation.en: I think I put the right amount of baking soda in this time.
translation.zh: 这次苏打粉的份量应该拿捏准了

translation.en: Get ready for a waffle volcano in three, two…
translation.zh: 华夫饼火山要爆发咯 三、二…

translation.en: Must've mixed the catalyst wrong.
translation.zh: 一定是把催化剂混错了

translation.en: You'll get it next time.
translation.zh: 下次一定会成功的 儿子

translation.en: Can I sign your math homework?
translation.zh: 我能给你的数学作业签字吗？

translation.en: Duh. Yeah, you can sign all my homework, except for math. Whoops.
translation.zh: 当然啊 你能给我所有的作业签字就除了数学作业 哎呦不行

translation.en: -You told me you finished everything. -Hey, don't worry.
translation.zh: 昨晚你告诉我 作业都写完了 嘿 别担心

translation.en: I get by on my charm.
translation.zh: 我能靠我的魅力混过去

translation.en: Honey, I'm gonna stop by the gym after work, okay?
translation.zh: 亲爱的下班后我要去一下健身房 好吗？

translation.en: I need to keep sculpting the Carlos.
translation.zh: 我得继续雕塑卡洛斯

translation.en: -Tonight? You're stopping by the gym? -Yeah. Tonight.
translation.zh: -你今晚要去健身房？-对 今晚

translation.en: -Really? Tonight? -[Carlos] Tonight.
translation.zh: -真的？今晚？-今晚

translation.en: Oh. Tonight? No, no, not tonight. No, tonight is, um, is our…
translation.zh: 今晚？当然不是今晚 今晚是我们的…

translation.en: -Your… The kids'… Uh… -Come on.
translation.zh: 你的… 孩子的… 不是吧

translation.en: -Anniver… Birthday? Soccer? -Really? Come on. You can do it.
translation.zh: 纪念日？生日？ -不是吧 你可以的-足球赛？

translation.en: -Parent-teacher night, Daddy. -Ah. That one. Yeah.
translation.zh: 家长教师会议 爸爸 对 就是那个

translation.en: I don't understand how you can open this refrigerator ten times a day
translation.zh: 我真不明白你怎么能一天开十次冰箱

translation.en: and not see this beautiful calendar.
translation.zh: 却看不到这美丽的日历

translation.en: Eh, because it's gotten a little over-complicated.
translation.zh: 因为它变得有点太复杂了

translation.en: -It hurts my eyes. -[Carlos] Growing up, things were simple.
translation.zh: 看得我眼睛疼 我小时候一切都很简单

translation.en: You wake up, go to school or work, and then you have to--
translation.zh: 你起床 去上学或上班然后就能腾出时间…

translation.en: I know how to twerk.
translation.zh: 我知道要怎么臀

translation.en: -Does she mean twerk twerk? -"To work," not "twerk." Is she twerking?
translation.zh: -她是说电臀吗？-我说“腾”  不是“臀”

translation.en: [Katie] She totally is.
translation.zh: -她在扭臀吗？-没错 爱丽 不行！

translation.en: -[Allison] No! -Not side to side, Ellie. Up and down.
translation.zh: 不是左右扭 爱丽 是上下扭

translation.en: -Let me show you. -Katie. No.
translation.zh: -我来教你-凯蒂 不行

translation.en: -[Carlos] Do you want me to… -No!
translation.zh: -你要我…-不行！

translation.en: Really loosen your hips.
translation.zh: 臀部这里要放松

translation.en: Nobody's loosening their hips. Child!
translation.zh: 不用放松什么臀部 孩子们

translation.en: Really pop it, Ellie.
translation.zh: 用力扭 爱丽

translation.en: [Allison] Carlos, help me out!
translation.zh: 卡洛斯 帮忙说两句啊！

translation.en: Yo. You gotta shake your body.
translation.zh: 哟 你得摇摆你的身体

translation.en: Come on. Pop it, Ellie!
translation.zh: 来吧 爱丽 用力扭！

translation.en: Nobody's popping it! We are late!
translation.zh: 谁都不用扭 我们要迟到了！

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
translation.zh: 好了 出发了！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 哦耶！

translation.en: The catalyst!
translation.zh: 催化剂！

translation.en: I mean, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我是说 我很抱歉

translation.en: You can put on your music if you want, Daddy. I don't mind.
translation.zh: 你可以放你的音乐 爸爸 我不介意

translation.en: -Really, honey? -Yup.
translation.zh: -真的吗 亲爱的？-嗯

translation.en: Okay. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢谢你

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I'm a gummy bear Yes, I'm a gummy bear ♪
translation.zh: 喔 我是软糖熊 对 我是软糖熊

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I'm a yummy, tummy, funny Lucky gummy bear ♪
translation.zh: 我是美味可口、幽默、幸运的软糖熊

translation.en: ♪ Oh yeah, gummy, gummy Gummy, gummy, gummy bear ♪
translation.zh: 软糖 软糖 软糖 软糖 软糖熊

translation.en: ♪ Gummy, gummy, gummy, gummy, gummy bear ♪
translation.zh: 软糖 软糖 软糖 软糖 软糖熊

translation.en: [girl] So, what'd she say?
translation.zh: 她怎么说？

translation.en: Bad news, Lay. Mom gave a thumbs-down to Fleekfest.
translation.zh: 坏消息 蕾拉 妈不让我去闪光音乐节

translation.en: [Layla] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: But your mom's so smart and cool and gorgeous.
translation.zh: 但你妈妈又聪明又酷 而且美爆了

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Sometimes I'm like, "Is she my mom, or is she a runway model?"
translation.zh: 有时候我会想她到底是我妈妈还是个超模？

translation.en: If I'm so great, you won't mind me coming with you, then you can go.
translation.zh: 如果我真这么棒你就不会介意我也一起去 那你就能去咯

translation.en: Yeah, no, thanks.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: Never mind.
translation.zh: 算了吧

translation.en: I don't get it. I took you two to Taylor Swift a couple of years ago.
translation.zh: 我不明白 几年前我带你俩去看泰勒斯威夫特的演唱会

translation.en: We had a blast.
translation.zh: 我们玩得超开心的

translation.en: -I was 12 then. I was a little tween. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我那时才12岁 是个小少女

translation.en: Dad said I could go. He believes in me. He knows I can handle myself.
translation.zh: 爸说我可以去 他对我有信心 他知道我能照顾自己

translation.en: Your dad just wants to be the good guy because he knows that I will say no.
translation.zh: 你爸只是想做好人因为他知道我不会允许的

translation.en: And I do believe in you.
translation.zh: 我不是对你没信心

translation.en: It's just that concerts like Fleekfest bring out
translation.zh: 只是像闪光音乐节这样的演唱会

translation.en: a whole world of people you have not been exposed to yet.
translation.zh: 会让你接触到很多你未曾接触过的人

translation.en: And it's not gonna happen without a parent.
translation.zh: 而这必须在父母的陪同下发生

translation.en: Well, when will I be able to go to concerts alone?
translation.zh: 那我什么时候才能自己去看演唱会？

translation.en: Never. You will always have to go to concerts with me your whole life.
translation.zh: 永远都不行你这辈子都要和我一起去看演唱会

translation.en: -Even when I'm your age? -Especially when you're my age.
translation.zh: -即使到了你这把年纪？-特别是那个时候

translation.en: You will love it because you love me.
translation.zh: 而且你绝对会喜欢 因为你爱我

translation.en: Four more years. Four more years. Four more years. ♪ Baby I need your loving ♪
translation.zh: 再忍个四年 四年而已

translation.en: Mom, no.
translation.zh: 妈 别唱

translation.en: -My ears are bleeding. -Mom!
translation.zh: -我耳朵快出血了！-妈！

translation.en: What is it with you and this song?
translation.zh: 你为什么老是唱这首歌？

translation.en: Because you love this song.
translation.zh: 因为你很喜欢这首歌啊

translation.en: -I sang it when you were a baby. -[Katie] I'm not a baby.
translation.zh: -你小时候我唱过给你听的-我不小了

translation.en: Okay, I better… I better turn it down for the school drop-off.
translation.zh: 好 该调低音量了 快到学校了

translation.en: I don't wanna go to school today.
translation.zh: 我今天不想去上学

translation.en: I don't wanna drop you off, but I have to.
translation.zh: 我也不想送你去学校但我不得不这么做

translation.en: You have to go to school, and I have to go to work.
translation.zh: 你得去上学 我得去上班

translation.en: -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes.
translation.zh: -不去-得去

translation.en: [Carlos] No drones inside, for the 50th time!
translation.zh: 我说过50次了不准在室内飞无人机！

translation.en: [man] Sorry, Mom.
translation.zh: 抱歉啦 老妈

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Torres. I… I promise this never happens.
translation.zh: 嘿 托雷斯先生我发誓这从来没发生过

translation.en: Look. Hey, I fixed it. It's working. I fixed--
translation.zh: 你看 我修好了 没问题了 嘿 我修好了

translation.en: [Carlos] Guys. Guys, it's too loud.
translation.zh: 两位 太大声了

translation.en: Guys! Joan?
translation.zh: 两位！乔安？

translation.en: Guys! Guys!
translation.zh: 你们俩！

translation.en: [panting] It's still way too loud.
translation.zh: 还是太大声了

translation.en: But the ads are going to say these speakers will melt your brains.
translation.zh: 但广告会说这些喇叭会让你嗨到大脑融化的

translation.en: -That wouldn't hold up with a waiver. -Fine.
translation.zh: -有免责声明那就不成立了-好吧

translation.en: [groans] Boo.
translation.zh: 真扫兴

translation.en: My job is to keep us from getting sued. Bring the decibel level down.
translation.zh: 我的职责是不让我们被起诉 把分贝值降下来

translation.en: Also, you're not supposed to bring food in a testing area.
translation.zh: 还有 你们不应该把食物带进测试区

translation.en: I have to ask you to throw the McGriddle away.
translation.zh: 我得请你把那个煎松饼扔了

translation.en: [Carlos] Joan? Both of you.
translation.zh: 乔安？你俩都给我扔了

translation.en: [sighs] Mine's finished.
translation.zh: 我的已经喝完了

translation.en: Look, I hate saying no, but it's my job. Okay?
translation.zh: 听着 我也讨厌说“不”但那是我的职责 好吗？

translation.en: -[man] Mrs. Torres? Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: -托雷斯太太？你好-你好

translation.en: [interviewer] You were VP of marketing at Kulger Food?
translation.zh: -你曾是酷格食品的营销副总？-对 担任了很多年

translation.en: For a long time. I loved that job,
translation.zh: -你曾是酷格食品的营销副总？-对 担任了很多年 我很喜欢那份工作

translation.en: but then I had kids, and for a while, it was just too much.
translation.zh: 但后来我有了孩子有一阵子真的兼顾不来

translation.en: I bet you're better at multitasking.
translation.zh: 那你一定很擅长多重任务处理

translation.en: I never stopped working. I just stopped getting paid for it.
translation.zh: 老实说 我根本没停止过工作只是不再领工资而已

translation.en: I get it. I mean, I'm a mom too.
translation.zh: 我明白 我自己也是妈妈

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. Of course you are.
translation.zh: 是 你当然是了

translation.en: I mean, call me crazy, but this feels so nice.
translation.zh: 我是说 说我疯狂也好 但这感觉真棒

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: Listen, I would love to hire you for something. I would, but--
translation.zh: 听着 我真的很想雇用你 真的 但是…

translation.en: -Oh, I'm so glad. -Allison, this is an entry-level position.
translation.zh: 噢 太好了 艾莉森 这是个入门级职位

translation.en: I mean, I'm looking for some entitled millennial
translation.zh: 我想找的是一个自我感觉良好的千禧一代

translation.en: who I'd keep here until 10:00 every night.
translation.zh: 我会每晚都把她留到十点

translation.en: Every night.
translation.zh: 每晚

translation.en: [interviewer] Who I could watch cry while eating a gluten-free burrito
translation.zh: 然后看着她边哭边吃她的无麸质卷饼

translation.en: and hashtags, "Hurt feelings. This job is so unfair."
translation.zh: 边发推文抱怨：“#工作不公平 #好委屈”

translation.en: I wouldn't want to do that to you.
translation.zh: 我可不想那样对你

translation.en: I like you too much.
translation.zh: 我太喜欢你了

translation.en: I like you too.
translation.zh: 我也喜欢你

translation.en: -[Carlos] I'm sorry about the job, honey. -[Allison] Oh, it's fine.
translation.zh: 工作的事我很抱歉 亲爱的 哦 没事

translation.en: I don't know that I'm still passionate about marketing anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我也不确定我对营销是否还充满热情

translation.en: Not enough to cry into my gluten-free burrito.
translation.zh: 还不足以让我啃着无麸质卷饼哭泣

translation.en: Hey. If I'm gonna go back to work,
translation.zh: 嘿 如果我要回去工作

translation.en: I need to make sure our kids are okay without me first.
translation.zh: 我得先确定孩子们没有我也没事

translation.en: Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Torres.
translation.zh: 你们好 托雷斯先生和太太

translation.en: -[man] Please, take a seat. -Thank you. We're getting two for one.
translation.zh: 请坐吧 谢谢 哇 左右开弓呢

translation.en: -I guess we'll be home early. -[chuckling]
translation.zh: 看来能早点回家了

translation.en: Is this about Nando's grades? Because we are working on focus--
translation.zh: 这和南多的成绩有关吗？因为我们正努力加强…

translation.en: Uh, it's not about Nando's grades, although, uh, they're not great.
translation.zh: 这不是关于南多的成绩虽然说他的成绩并不理想

translation.en: Oh. Getting better.
translation.zh: 正在进步中

translation.en: We wanted to meet with you together
translation.zh: 我们之所以想一起见你们

translation.en: because, uh, we've noticed a common theme in Katie and Nando's schoolwork.
translation.zh: 是因为我们注意到凯蒂和南多的作业有个共同的主题

translation.en: What's the common theme?
translation.zh: 什么共同主题？

translation.en: Well, here's a haiku Katie wrote in my English class.
translation.zh: 这是凯蒂在我的英语课上写的一首俳句

translation.en: "A caged bird am I.
translation.zh: “我是笼中鸟”

translation.en: My mother, my sweet captor.
translation.zh: “被亲娘囚禁牢笼”

translation.en: Mother, let me fly."
translation.zh: “娘 让我飞吧 ”

translation.en: "Mother, my sweet captor.
translation.zh: “被亲娘囚禁牢笼”

translation.en: -Mother, let me fly." -Five, seven, five. She nailed it. Haiku.
translation.zh: -“娘 让我飞吧 ”-五-七-五 没错 是俳句

translation.en: I didn't think much of it at first,
translation.zh: 老实说 我一开始并没多想

translation.en: until Mr. Chan told me about a video that Nando made for his history class.
translation.zh: 直到陈老师告诉我南多为他的历史课做了个视频

translation.en: He made a video? That's pretty cool.
translation.zh: 他做了个视频？ 挺酷啊

translation.en: Let's just have a look at the video.
translation.zh: 我们来看一下这个视频吧

translation.en: [Nando] The following program is intended for mature audiences only.
translation.zh: 以下节目仅限成人观众

translation.en: It contains violence, adult language, and nudity.
translation.zh: 它包含暴力、粗俗言语和裸露镜头

translation.en: Viewer discretion is advised.
translation.zh: 请观众酌情观看

translation.en: Don't worry. There's no nudity.
translation.zh: 别担心 没有裸露镜头

translation.en: -Oh, okay. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 哦 很好

translation.en: [Nando] Stalin, Mussolini,
translation.zh: 斯大林、墨索里尼

translation.en: and Mom.
translation.zh: 还有我妈

translation.en: My mother might not have had anyone tortured or killed…
translation.zh: 我妈也许没折磨过或杀过任何人…

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: 目前还没

translation.en: [Nando] …but in our house, she's no less of a dictator.
translation.zh: 但在我们家她是个不折不扣的独裁者

translation.en: So now I'm a dictator.
translation.zh: 我现在还是独裁者了

translation.en: I'm not asking twice, Nando. You will do what I say, when I say it.
translation.zh: 我不会说第二遍 南多 我让你做什么 你就得做什么

translation.en: I'm your mother. I don't need a reason.
translation.zh: 我是你妈妈 我不需要理由

translation.en: I don't, so…
translation.zh: 的确不需要嘛

translation.en: [Nando] Her goal, maximum oppression.
translation.zh: 她的目标是最大限度地镇压

translation.en: You're not going till you finish your homework.
translation.zh: 写完作业前你哪儿也别想去

translation.en: I mean, that's parenting.
translation.zh: 我是说 为人父母嘛

translation.en: Stop. It's like 1984 in this house. Big Mother is always watching.
translation.zh: 站住 这家里跟《1984》没两样老母亲一直在盯着你

translation.en: I like that nickname. It's tough.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这绰号 够强硬

translation.en: Why can't Miss Hoffling ever assign a happy book?
translation.zh: 霍芙琳老师就不能布置些快乐的书吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay. They are depressing. Have you ever read Little Women?
translation.zh: 它们真的很令人沮丧嘛 你看过《小妇人》吗？

translation.en: She gets scarlet fever.
translation.zh: 她感染了猩红热

translation.en: -The Little Prince? -[Hoffling] He has no family.
translation.zh: 《小王子》？ 他无亲无故

translation.en: Harry Potter's an orphan. There are no happy books.
translation.zh: 哈利波特是个孤儿根本就没有快乐的书

translation.en: Don't walk away from me.
translation.zh: 不许就这么走掉

translation.en: [roaring] Nando!
translation.zh: 南多！

translation.en: [Carlos] Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你要去哪里？

translation.en: Oh, come on, honey. You can make anyone look bad with editing.
translation.zh: 别这样嘛 亲爱的 剪辑能让任何人看起来像坏人

translation.en: -You make me look bad. -Me? Why me?
translation.zh: -你让我看起来像坏人-我？为什么？

translation.en: Because you get to be the fun dad everybody loves,
translation.zh: 因为你能当大家都喜欢的有趣老爸

translation.en: and I am stuck being the bad cop.
translation.zh: 而我就只能唱黑脸

translation.en: You didn't see the dad as the villain in that video, did you?
translation.zh: 你没看到那视频里的反派是爸爸吧？

translation.en: It'll probably get uploaded to YouTube. Then I'll just be the viral psycho mom.
translation.zh: 说不定会被上传到YouTube 然后我就会变成家喻户晓的疯子妈妈

translation.en: How'd you get to be the fun one? I was the fun one.
translation.zh: 你怎么成了有趣的那个？我才总是有趣的那个

translation.en: Look, Ally, I am the bad guy all day at work.
translation.zh: 听着 艾莉森我每天工作时都得当坏人

translation.en: Every time I walk into that office, people stop laughing and leave the room,
translation.zh: 我每次走进办公室大家就会停止说笑 然后走出去

translation.en: but when I come home, the kids, they actually smile when they see me.
translation.zh: 但当我回到家时孩子们看到我都会开心地笑

translation.en: Yeah. Well, it's not fair.
translation.zh: 是 但这不公平

translation.en: I hear myself with the kids, and I think I wouldn't even hang out with me.
translation.zh: 看着自己带孩子的那副样子连我都不想跟自己相处了

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I have a suggestion.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我有个建议

translation.en: Sorry, I didn't mean to frighten you. I was just eavesdropping or spying.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不是有意要吓你们的 我只是在偷听 或者偷看

translation.en: There are so many parents out there, and I come in here to hide,
translation.zh: 外面有好多家长所以我就进来这里躲

translation.en: and then I got really hungry, so I made a huge thing of tots.
translation.zh: 躲着躲着就肚子饿了所以就弄了一堆炸薯球

translation.en: [chuckles] Would you guys care for a tot?
translation.zh: 你们想来点炸薯球吗？

translation.en: Do you want a tot? A hot tot?
translation.zh: 要炸薯球吗？热腾腾的炸薯球？

translation.en: Come here. Have a hot tot.
translation.zh: 来吧 吃个热腾腾的炸薯球

translation.en: Have a tot. They're perfectly lukewarm.
translation.zh: 两位 吃个炸薯球吧 这温度正好

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: It's Mr. Deacon. Katie and Nando's guidance counselor.
translation.zh: 他是迪肯老师凯蒂和南多的指导顾问

translation.en: Yes, but thanks to budget cuts, I'm also the PE teacher/football coach.
translation.zh: 是 但由于预算削减我也是体育老师兼橄榄球教练

translation.en: Go, Cougars! Shoot the layup for the touchdown. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 美洲狮队 加油！ 上篮然后触地得分

translation.en: I don't know anything about sports. No, I was a science major.
translation.zh: 我对体育一窍不通 我是理科出身的

translation.en: I specialized in the gastrointestinal behavior of field mice.
translation.zh: 我专门研究田鼠的肠胃行为

translation.en: But I do know a thing or two about parenting,
translation.zh: 不过我对育儿这事还是有些了解的

translation.en: both professionally and personally.
translation.zh: 无论是从专业还是个人方面来说

translation.en: I have six beautiful kids at home.
translation.zh: 我家里有六个可爱的孩子

translation.en: Timmy, Tommy, Tonya, Tanya, Tyson, and Doug.
translation.zh: 蒂米、汤米、谭雅、唐雅泰森和道格

translation.en: How come you look like you're just back from Tahiti?
translation.zh: 你怎么会看起来像刚从大溪地度假回来？

translation.en: You want to know what my secret is?
translation.zh: 想知道我的秘诀是什么吗？

translation.en: I give my kids Yes Days.
translation.zh: 我给我的孩子们“有求必应日”

translation.en: Yes Days? What's a Yes Day?
translation.zh: 有求必应日？那是什么？

translation.en: You pick a day in the not-too-distant future,
translation.zh: 你挑个在不远的将来的日子

translation.en: and for 24 hours, you say yes to everything that your kids want.
translation.zh: 在那24小时内  对孩子们的所有要求都说“好”

translation.en: -[Carlos] Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-对啊

translation.en: -Are you serious? -What, you say yes to everything?
translation.zh: -你是认真的吗？-等等 什么都答应吗？

translation.en: Well, you set some ground rules.
translation.zh: 先制定一些基本规则

translation.en: They can't ask for something in the future,
translation.zh: 他们不能要求将来的事

translation.en: and they can't kill anybody, obvi.
translation.zh: 而且不能杀人 这是当然

translation.en: I know it sounds crazy, but it is a true game changer.
translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很疯狂但它真的会彻底改变一切

translation.en: They liberate kids and give them a rare sense of autonomy,
translation.zh: 可以解放孩子们给予他们少有的自主感

translation.en: and it sets the parents free too.
translation.zh: 而且家长也会得到解脱

translation.en: Yeah, Mr. Coach Deacon,
translation.zh: 那个 迪肯老师兼教练

translation.en: I would love to just take a day off from being a mom
translation.zh: 我非常想放假一天不当妈妈

translation.en: and let my kids do whatever they want,
translation.zh: 让孩子们随心所欲

translation.en: but I'd also love to find a rainbow unicorn and fly it to the moon.
translation.zh: 但我也很想找到一只彩虹独角兽然后骑着它飞上月球

translation.en: Then I think you'd want a pegasus.
translation.zh: 那我想你要的是只飞马

translation.en: More of a pegacorn.
translation.zh: 应该是飞独角兽

translation.en: The point is, you don't know our kids.
translation.zh: 重点是 你不了解我们的孩子

translation.en: Oh, these tots have turned.
translation.zh: 这些炸薯球变质了

translation.en: If we tried what you're proposing,
translation.zh: 如果我们按你的建议去做

translation.en: it… it would be apocalyptic.
translation.zh: 会引发世界末日的

translation.en: You're right. I don't know your kids. I don't know everything,
translation.zh: 你说得对 我不了解你的孩子 我也不是什么都知道

translation.en: but…
translation.zh: 可是…

translation.en: I will say this.
translation.zh: 我还是要说

translation.en: You should say yes to a Yes Day.
translation.zh: 你应该尝试一下有求必应日

translation.en: Ooh! Meatloaf!
translation.zh: 哦耶 肉饼！

translation.en: "Kids who are given Yes Days consume less sugar,"
translation.zh: “被给予有求必应日的孩子糖分摄取量较低”

translation.en: not really, "and spend less time on the Internet."
translation.zh: 是真的 “而且上网时间较短”

translation.en: It doesn't make sense. You're not falling for this?
translation.zh: 这根本没道理 你不会真信了吧？

translation.en: Everything happens for a reason.
translation.zh: 事出皆有因

translation.en: Maybe there's a reason that guy showed up with those tater tots.
translation.zh: 也许那家伙带着炸薯球出现是有原因的

translation.en: Maybe by being a little less serious, we can make things better.
translation.zh: 也许不那么严肃真的能让事情好起来

translation.en: I mean, you said it yourself.
translation.zh: 你自己也说过嘛

translation.en: We've been trying to do it the right way. Maybe it's time to try something new.
translation.zh: 我们一直在努力找合适的育儿法 也许该尝试点新东西了

translation.en: So? Tired of hearing how great I am?
translation.zh: 怎么样？听腻了我有多厉害吗？

translation.en: You want to give Steven Spielberg here a Yes Day?
translation.zh: 你想给这位斯皮尔伯格导演一个有求必应日？

translation.en: What's a Yes Day?
translation.zh: 什么是有求必应日？

translation.en: This new thing where parents agree
translation.zh: 是个新玩意儿

translation.en: to say yes to everything their kids ask for for 24 hours.
translation.zh: 长达24小时父母将答应孩子的所有要求

translation.en: -Radical! -How am I just hearing about this?
translation.zh: -太激进了！-我怎么现在才知道？

translation.en: Well, don't get too excited. Mom probably won't let us have one anyway.
translation.zh: 别高兴得太早 妈大概也不会答应

translation.en: Well, what does that mean? Why wouldn't I?
translation.zh: 那是什么意思？我为什么不会？

translation.en: [Katie] Yes Days are, like, fun.
translation.zh: 有求必应日是有趣的东西

translation.en: And you're, like, a fun killer.
translation.zh: 而你是个乐趣杀手

translation.en: -Oh. -Come on, Katie, your mom is plenty fun.
translation.zh: 拜托 凯蒂 你妈妈可有趣了

translation.en: She is fun.
translation.zh: 她真的很有趣

translation.en: I have had a very long day, and I'm gonna go to bed.
translation.zh: 我今天真的很累 我先去睡了

translation.en: -So, good night. -[Carlos] No, we…
translation.zh: -所以 晚安-不 我们…

translation.en: We still need to…
translation.zh: 我们还得…

translation.en: -[Allison] It's okay. -Honey? Tell your mom she's fun.
translation.zh: -没关系-亲爱的 喂 快告诉你妈 她很有趣

translation.en: -Nando? -You told us never to lie.
translation.zh: -南多-你说过不可以说谎的

translation.en: Yeah, Daddy.
translation.zh: 是啊 爸爸

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿 你们

translation.en: [whispers] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Of course you think your mom can't be fun. You don't even know me.
translation.zh: 你们当然觉得我无趣了你们根本就不了解我

translation.en: I invented fun. I… I used to be the funnest person I knew.
translation.zh: 乐趣是我创造的我曾是我所见过最有趣的人

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 后来怎么了？

translation.en: What happened was I had three babies that had to be kept safe and alive.
translation.zh: 后来我生了三个我必须养活和保护的娃

translation.en: It was a lot of pressure, but that's not the point.
translation.zh: 那压力挺大的 但那不是重点

translation.en: The point is, I can be fun again.
translation.zh: 重点是 我可以再次变得有趣

translation.en: Mom, really? There's no way.
translation.zh: 妈 真的？ 不可能

translation.en: [clicks tongue] I'll have a Yes Day.
translation.zh: 有求必应日

translation.en: We will have a super time.
translation.zh: 我们会玩得超嗨

translation.en: Just you watch and see.
translation.zh: 你等着瞧吧

translation.en: Mama can haiku too.
translation.zh: 你老妈我也会写俳句

translation.en: Sorry, but you couldn't make it through a Yes Morning, let alone a Yes Day.
translation.zh: 不好意思你连个有求必应早上都做不到 更别说一整天了

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Would you like to have a little wager on that?
translation.zh: 我们打个赌如何？

translation.en: Know what? I'd love to.
translation.zh: 好啊 我很乐意

translation.en: -[Allison] Hmph. -How about this?
translation.zh: 这样如何？

translation.en: If you say no one time,
translation.zh: 你只要说一次“不”

translation.en: I get to go to Fleekfest with Layla. No adults, no parents.
translation.zh: 我就可以和蕾拉一起去闪光音乐节没有大人 没有父母

translation.en: Just us young, underage, vulnerable girls.
translation.zh: 只有我们两个年轻、未成年的脆弱女孩

translation.en: Wait, honey. Are you sure?
translation.zh: 等等 亲爱的 你确定吗？

translation.en: I'll take your wager, missy,
translation.zh: 我接受你的赌注 大小姐

translation.en: because I know that I won't say no.
translation.zh: 因为我知道我绝不会说“不”

translation.en: And when you lose, and you will lose,
translation.zh: 如果你输了 而你输定了

translation.en: I am so fun that you will still get to go to your concert.
translation.zh: 你还是可以去看演唱会因为我太有趣了

translation.en: -Really? -Absolutely.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-当然

translation.en: With me.
translation.zh: 跟我一起去

translation.en: I'll sit next to you, and we'll hold hands.
translation.zh: 我会坐在你旁边 我们会手牵手

translation.en: We'll put our hands in the air like we just don't care.
translation.zh: 我们会高举双手 疯狂地挥舞

translation.en: I want in on this.
translation.zh: 算我一个

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: 就这么办

translation.en: [Allison] There are ground rules, though. The Yes Day has to be earned.
translation.zh: 不过呢 有一些基本规则 有求必应日是需要争取的

translation.en: Do your chores.
translation.zh: 做好家务

translation.en: Finish your homework.
translation.zh: 写完作业

translation.en: You can do better.
translation.zh: 你能做得更好

translation.en: [Allison] You can't ask to do anything dangerous or illegal, obviously.
translation.zh: 你们显然不能要求做任何危险或非法的事

translation.en: -What are you guys up to over there? -Don't worry. It's totally safe.
translation.zh: 你们在做什么呢？ 别担心 这绝对安全

translation.en: [Allison] You'll each have a budget,
translation.zh: 你们每人都会有预算

translation.en: and you can't ask to travel more than 20 miles from home.
translation.zh: 而且不能要求去离家超过32公里的地方

translation.en: So this rules out Magic Mountain, Japan, and all space tourism.
translation.zh: 所以这就排除了魔法山乐园日本和所有的太空旅游

translation.en: Will you have to say yes to absolutely everything?
translation.zh: 你必须对所有一切都点头答应吗？

translation.en: Close, but there are some rules.
translation.zh: 差不多 但还是有规则的

translation.en: Oh man!
translation.zh: 哎呀

translation.en: Yes, bud.
translation.zh: 这就对了 小子

translation.en: [Allison] But the last rule is the biggest,
translation.zh: 但最后一条规则是最重要的

translation.en: that this family has the most fun we've ever had in our entire lives.
translation.zh: 这一天必须是咱们家这辈子玩得最开心的一天

translation.en: Any second. Any second. Any second. Any second. Any second.
translation.zh: 马上就是了

translation.en: It's Yes Day!
translation.zh: 今天是有求必应日！

translation.en: Everybody, wake up!
translation.zh: 大家 起床了！

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Come on, you sleepyheads. Get up! Come on.
translation.zh: 快点 你们两个瞌睡虫 快起床！

translation.en: Nando, it's too early. We have the whole day. Go back to bed.
translation.zh: 南多 太早了 我们有一整天的时间 回去睡觉吧

translation.en: Mom?
-Having regrets, Mom? -Mom?
translation.zh: 妈 后悔了吗？

translation.en: [Katie] Look, she's so afraid, she can't even move.
translation.zh: 你看 她怕到动弹不得了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 人呢？

translation.en: Who's ready for Yes Day? Whoo!
translation.zh: 谁准备好迎接有求必应日了？

translation.en: What've you done with our mother?
translation.zh: 你把我们妈妈怎么了？

translation.en: You know my rule about no bouncing on the bed?
translation.zh: 你们知道我说过不准在床上跳吧？

translation.en: Wanna bounce on the bed?
translation.zh: 想在床上跳吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -[Nando] Sure!
translation.zh: -想！-好啊！

translation.en: Do it! Do it!
translation.zh: 那就跳吧！

translation.en: I know you're too mature. It's okay. Whoo!
translation.zh: 我知道你已经长大了不玩这个 没关系

translation.en: -[Nando] This is so much fun! -[Ellie] Nando!
translation.zh: -真是太好玩了！-南多！

translation.en: Oh hi!
translation.zh: 你来啦！

translation.en: -Get up! -No!
translation.zh: -快起来！-不要！

translation.en: [all] Get up!
translation.zh: 起来！

translation.en: -Wake up! -No! Get off!
translation.zh: -起床了！-别吵！

translation.en: [Nando] Yes Day!
translation.zh: 有求必应日！

translation.en: Sorry, guys, no screen time today.
translation.zh: 抱歉 两位 今天没有屏幕时间

translation.en: -Are you serious? -Sorry, Mama.
translation.zh: -你在开玩笑吧？-抱歉 妈咪

translation.en: The entire day you can't use anything that has a screen.
translation.zh: 你们今天不能使用任何有屏幕的东西

translation.en: That means no cell phones, no laptops, no iPads, nada.
translation.zh: 也就是说手机、笔记本和平板电脑通通不准用

translation.en: What? Can I at least tell them that I'll be off the grid?
translation.zh: 什么？能至少让我通知大家我要离网吗？

translation.en: -Please? -I'm not the boss.
translation.zh: -拜托了-不是我说了算

translation.en: Okay, fine. You have one minute.
translation.zh: 行 给你一分钟

translation.en: -Starting 30 seconds ago. Come on! -Okay, okay!
translation.zh: -30秒前就开始了 快点！-好啦

translation.en: Hey, hey, don't ship the speakers until I get regulatory approval.
translation.zh: 嘿 在我获得监管部门的批准前别把喇叭运出去

translation.en: Yeah, the speaker… You know what? Forget it. I'll text you.
translation.zh: 对 喇叭 算了 我发短信给你吧

translation.en: Sorry, Dad. Time's up.
translation.zh: 抱歉 老爸 时间到

translation.en: You knew to be prepared.
translation.zh: 你知道要做好心里准备的

translation.en: And we are so glad that you're so prepared.
translation.zh: 我们很高兴你做足了心理准备

translation.en: Ellie wants to get you dressed and do your hair and makeup.
translation.zh: 因为爱丽想为你挑衣服、梳妆打扮

translation.en: I have a vision.
translation.zh: 我有个完美的构想

translation.en: Oh, but I have this shirt.
translation.zh: （有求必应日） 但我特地穿了这件上衣耶

translation.en: -[Ellie] Sorry. -Ah.
translation.zh: 很遗憾

translation.en: I'm… I'm glad you're using your watercolors.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你选择用你的水彩颜料

translation.en: [Katie] Really get it everywhere.
translation.zh: 对 要涂满整张脸

translation.en: -That's a great way to blend. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你这晕染手法不错嘛-是啊

translation.en: -Really? You want to use glitter? -Yep.
translation.zh: -真的？你要用亮片？-对

translation.en: Really? She's gonna use glitter?
translation.zh: 真的？她要用亮片？

translation.en: Should we make you look as crazy as possible?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们该尽量让你看起来疯狂点吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: -Should Nando skate in the house? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你觉得南多该在屋里玩轮滑吗？-好啊

translation.en: Do you think we should get a dog?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们该养只狗吗？

translation.en: -Hang on, that's in the future. Nice try. -Okay.
translation.zh: 等等 那是将来的事了 -真有你的-好吧

translation.en: -Oh yeah! Yeah. -Yeah! I love it! That is it.
translation.zh: -哇哦！-好耶 这套我爱！

translation.en: -We love that one. -No.
translation.zh: -我们喜欢这套-不行

translation.en: No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不行！

translation.en: -Still not right! -Oh, come on, Ellie, that's perfect.
translation.zh: -还是不对！-得了吧 爱丽 这很棒啊

translation.en: That's the one!
translation.zh: 就是这套了！

translation.en: Do you like it, Daddy?
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗 爸爸？

translation.en: I love it. This is the best makeover I've ever had.
translation.zh: 我超爱的 这是我做过最棒的大变身

translation.en: How many makeovers have you had?
translation.zh: 你做过多少次大变身啊？

translation.en: Before this one?
translation.zh: 在这之前吗？

translation.en: None.
translation.zh: 没做过

translation.en: [Nando] Oh. Nice job, Ellie.
translation.zh: 做得好 爱丽

translation.en: -Thank you. -What's that?
translation.zh: -谢谢-那是什么？

translation.en: We made a list of our five big asks.
translation.zh: 我们列了个五大神秘任务的清单

translation.en: For the day to be a success, we have to make it through all five.
translation.zh: 必须完成所有五个任务今天才算成功

translation.en: I love a list.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢清单了

translation.en: Number one!
translation.zh: 任务一！

translation.en: -[Carlos] Is that Korean? -[Nando] Breakfast surprise!
translation.zh: 那是韩文吗？ 惊喜早餐！

translation.en: To the Explorer!
translation.zh: 坐上福特探险者吧！

translation.en: -We gotta change first, right? -[Ellie] No!
translation.zh: 我们要先换衣服 对吧？ 不行！

translation.en: -Katie? -Right?
translation.zh: -凯蒂？-对吧？

translation.en: [Ellie] Nope on a rope.
translation.zh: 想都别想！

translation.en: Hey, kids, what is it with the sparklies around number five?
translation.zh: 孩子们 第五个任务被亮片包围着是怎么回事？

translation.en: The main event.
translation.zh: 那是重头戏

translation.en: The only thing that we can tell you about it is nothing.
translation.zh: 我们唯一能告诉你们的是“无可奉告”

translation.en: Not even a hint? The less you know, the better.
translation.zh: -给个提示都不行？-你们知道的越少越好

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 哦 好吧

translation.en: I'll be gone for the main event. I'll be at Fleekfest.
translation.zh: 重头戏就不用算我了那时候我会在闪光音乐节

translation.en: It's gonna be so much fun!
translation.zh: 一定会超好玩的！

translation.en: I've been memorizing all the lyrics to the H-E-R songs, and they're really good.
translation.zh: 我把H-E-R所有歌的歌词背下来了她的歌真的很棒耶！

translation.en: Mom, it's H.E.R.
translation.zh: 妈 是H.E.R.

translation.en: Oh, H.E.R.? Okay.
translation.zh: 是H.E.R.哦？好的

translation.en: -Who's H.E.R.? -[Nando] This is H.E.R. on the radio.
translation.zh: -H.E.R.是谁？-电台里这个就是H.E.R.

translation.en: She's the headliner for Fleekfest.
translation.zh: 她是闪光音乐节的主唱

translation.en: You know, Katie and my girls' night tonight.
translation.zh: 你知道的 我和凯蒂今晚的闺蜜之夜

translation.en: [Katie] You're not going.
translation.zh: 你不用去

translation.en: Layla's cousin Julie's taking us. I told her she could have the ticket.
translation.zh: 蕾拉的表姐朱莉会带我们去我已经答应把票给她了

translation.en: Oh, you might want to tell Layla's cousin Julie not to get her hopes up.
translation.zh: 你还是告诉蕾拉的表姐朱莉别抱太大希望吧

translation.en: Last time I checked, it was a bet, and I'm gonna win.
translation.zh: 如果我没记错的话我们打了个赌 而我赢定了

translation.en: No, you're not.
translation.zh: 不 你不会赢

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
translation.zh: 我一定会

translation.en: -Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. -[Katie] No. Not like that.
translation.zh: 是的 没错 不 别这样

translation.en: -[Nando] So embarrassing. -Yes. Yes.
translation.zh: 好丢脸啊

translation.en: -Hi, we're celebrating our first-- -No! You can't tell him it's Yes Day.
translation.zh: 嗨 我们在庆祝我们的首个… 不行 不能告诉他今天是有求必应日

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Allison] Oh, coffee.
translation.zh: 啊 咖啡

translation.en: [Carlos] Ah, breakfast.
translation.zh: 啊 早餐

translation.en: Hi. Where's the carnival? Looks like Burning Man.
translation.zh: 嗨 哪有狂欢节啊？穿得像要去火人节似的

translation.en: What can I get you?
translation.zh: 想点些什么呢？

translation.en: Some acai bowls? Smoothies?
translation.zh: -巴西紫莓冰沙？水果奶昔？-好

translation.en: -Yes. -We'd like that one, please.
translation.zh: 我们要那个 谢谢

translation.en: The Gut Buster?
translation.zh: 你说翻江倒海碗？

translation.en: [Nando] Yeah, definitely!
translation.zh: 对 没错！

translation.en: Hey, it's $40.
translation.zh: 嘿 那要40美元呢

translation.en: Not if you finish it in under 30 minutes. Then it's free.
translation.zh: 如果在30分钟内吃完就是免费的

translation.en: -That is true. -What's in the Gut Buster?
translation.zh: -没错-翻江倒海碗里有什么啊？

translation.en: Ice cream!
translation.zh: 冰淇淋！

translation.en: -Oh boy. I wanted a cappuccino. -Oh my God. Wow.
translation.zh: -天哪 我只想喝杯卡布奇诺-哇塞

translation.en: Are you ready for this? -[Carlos] Okay. -[Ellie] Yes!
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？-好了！

translation.en: [Nando] There's blueberries. I love blueberries.
translation.zh: 还有蓝莓耶 我超爱蓝莓的

translation.en: I want it.
translation.zh: 我要吃

translation.en: So you must eat everything inside the bowl and on the plate,
translation.zh: 你们必须把碗里和盘子里的一切吃完

translation.en: including ice cream, brownies, waffle cones--
translation.zh: 这包括冰淇淋、布朗尼、华夫蛋筒…

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Oh, just a standard contract.
translation.zh: 那只是份格式合同

translation.en: And how many people have lost their eyeballs?
translation.zh: 有多少人失去了眼球啊？

translation.en: You mean this month? Or all time?
translation.zh: 你是指这个月还是至今为止？

translation.en: He's a lawyer.
translation.zh: 他是律师

translation.en: -Oh, is he? -Yeah, I'm a lawyer.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-对 我是律师

translation.en: -You have 30 minutes to finish this. -[Carlos] Okay, ready.
translation.zh: -你们有30分钟时间完成这项挑战-准备好了

translation.en: I am looking forward to this.
translation.zh: 我好期待哦

translation.en: Ready, set, go, go, go!
translation.zh: 预备 开始！

translation.en: Ellie, go! Ellie, keep eating.
translation.zh: 爱丽 快吃！ 爱丽 别停下来

translation.en: [employee] You guys are doing great, but you have to pick up the pace.
translation.zh: 你们的表现很棒 但得加快步伐了

translation.en: It's a lot of ice cream.
translation.zh: 这冰淇淋可不少哦

translation.en: [employee] Let's go! Keep it moving!
translation.zh: 加油！继续吃！

translation.en: -[in slow motion] Brain freeze! -Help your brother.
translation.zh: -脑袋冻住了！-快帮帮你弟弟

translation.en: The clown from your birthday party. Snakes in the toilet. Summer school!
translation.zh: 呃 你生日派对上的小丑 厕所里的蛇 暑期学校！

translation.en: -Scaring's for hiccups. -Hold his nose!
translation.zh: -吓人是治打嗝的-捏住他的鼻子！

translation.en: -Pull hard on your tongue! -Also for hiccups!
translation.zh: -用力拉你的舌头！-那也是治打嗝的！

translation.en: [employee] Come on, family!
translation.zh: 加油啊 大家！

translation.en: I can't do this anymore. It's getting gross.
translation.zh: 我吃不下了 我开始觉得恶心了

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm gonna explode.
translation.zh: 我肚子快撑爆了

translation.en: I'm full.
translation.zh: 我饱了

translation.en: Jeez, Dad. You're like a human ice cream vacuum.
translation.zh: 天啊 老爸你简直是个人肉冰淇淋吸尘器

translation.en: I saw him eat like this once at a HomeTown Buffet when we were dating,
translation.zh: 咱们还在约会时我曾见过他在家乡自助餐上这样吃

translation.en: and I knew it would pay off.
translation.zh: 我就知道会派上用场的

translation.en: I'll take your spoon.
translation.zh: 把你的勺子给我

translation.en: Daddy! Daddy!
translation.zh: 老爸！老爸！

translation.en: Ten, nine,
translation.zh: 十、九

translation.en: eight, seven, six,
translation.zh: 八、七、六

translation.en: five, four, three, two, one!
translation.zh: 五、四、三、二、一！

translation.en: [in Korean] Do you believe in miracles!
translation.zh: 这就是奇迹吗？

translation.en: -[stomach rumbling] -Are you feeling okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: -[Allison] That was so beautiful. -Is it coming up?
translation.zh: 真是太感人了 涌上来了吗？

translation.en: Uh, section 10 of the contract says vomiting voids the win.
translation.zh: 按合同第十条规定 呕吐则成绩作废

translation.en: -Keep it down, babe. You can do it. -Think of the family reputation.
translation.zh: 别吐 宝贝 你可以的 想想我们家族的声誉

translation.en: Settle it right down.
translation.zh: 咽下去

translation.en: Don't think of anything gross, like beef sticks.
translation.zh: 别想恶心的东西 例如牛肉棒

translation.en: -[Allison] You can do it. -It's up to you.
translation.zh: -对-你可以的 选择权在你 桶就在你面前

translation.en: There's a bucket there.
translation.zh: 选择权在你 桶就在你面前

translation.en: -I'm good. -He's fine. You got this.
translation.zh: -不用了-他没事 你可以的

translation.en: You have to hold it. Ah.
translation.zh: 你必须忍住

translation.en: Well, we're officially losers.
translation.zh: 这下我们正式成为输家了

translation.en: -I am sorry. -Yeah, that doesn't sound good.
translation.zh: -真是抱歉-听起来不妙啊

translation.en: He didn't throw up! He didn't throw up!
translation.zh: 他没吐！

translation.en: It came out the other end!
translation.zh: 从另一端出来了！

translation.en: You did it!
translation.zh: 你们成功了！

translation.en: -[stomach rumbling] -Okay, kids.
translation.zh: 好 孩子们

translation.en: Look at your father. Look at this man.
translation.zh: 看看你们爸爸 看看这个男人

translation.en: He is going down as a Yes Day legend.
translation.zh: 他将成为有求必应日的传奇人物

translation.en: Yes, but no more food, please, not today.
translation.zh: 是 但今天别再让我吃东西了 拜托

translation.en: Dad, it's gonna be super chill.
translation.zh: 爸 放心 这个超惬意的

translation.en: It's relaxing.
translation.zh: 很让人放松

translation.en: And sanitary.
translation.zh: 而且很卫生

translation.en: What could be sanitary?
translation.zh: 有什么是卫生的？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: -Are we buying toilets? -[laughs] Oh no.
translation.zh: 我们要去买马桶吗？ 天哪 不是吧

translation.en: Oh, now this is what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 噢 这才对嘛

translation.en: A car wash is like being reborn.
translation.zh: 洗个车就像是重生一样

translation.en: This is exactly what I needed, kids. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这正是我需要的 孩子们 -谢谢你们-是啊

translation.en: -Yes. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -谢谢你们-是啊

translation.en: Yeah. This one's easy.
translation.zh: 对 这个任务很简单

translation.en: Hey, guys. One more thing.
translation.zh: 两位 还有一件事

translation.en: -Windows down! -What?
translation.zh: -摇下车窗！-什么？

translation.en: -Whoa, whoa, whoa. Whoa. -What?
translation.zh: -等一下-什么？

translation.en: Well, you have to. It's Yes Day.
translation.zh: 你们得答应啊 今天是有求必应日

translation.en: [gasps] What do we do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: I don't know. It's your car.
translation.zh: 我不知道 这是你的车

translation.en: Come on, Mom. You can say it. One word. Two letters. N-O.
translation.zh: 来吧 妈 想说就说吧 一句话 两个字 “不行”

translation.en: Windows down!
translation.zh: 摇下车窗！

translation.en: [man] No, no, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 不行！

translation.en: Oh my God! [screams]
translation.zh: 我的天啊！

translation.en: Mommy, your makeup!
translation.zh: 妈咪 你的妆花了！

translation.en: Yes Day! Oh my gosh!
translation.zh: 有求必应日！天啊！

translation.en: Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: 哦耶！

translation.en: Yes Day!
translation.zh: 有求必应日！

translation.en: I don't have to shower for a week!
translation.zh: 我一个星期不用洗澡了！

translation.en: You don't already!
translation.zh: 你本来就一个星期不洗澡！

translation.en: -Will we make it through this day? -They might be trying to kill us.
translation.zh: -我们能撑过今天吗？-他们可能是想杀我们呢

translation.en: Ew. Nando, you're…
translation.zh: 恶心 南多 你真…

translation.en: -Ugh. -Gross!
translation.zh: 恶心！

translation.en: [Allison] An unexpected plus of a windows-down car wash,
translation.zh: 摇下车窗洗车有个意想不到的好处

translation.en: the mystery smell is finally gone.
translation.zh: 那股神秘的怪味终于消失了

translation.en: I'd love to know where I'm driving.
translation.zh: 我真的很想知道我正在开车去哪

translation.en: Oh, sorry, Dad. The rules say you're not allowed to know.
translation.zh: 抱歉 老爸规则说你不能知道你要去哪儿

translation.en: Stop asking so many questions.
translation.zh: 别再问那么多问题了

translation.en: Oh, and, guys, so, new activity,
translation.zh: 对了 大家  新活动 新衣服

translation.en: new clothes.
translation.zh: 新活动 新衣服

translation.en: Here you go, Katie.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 这是你的

translation.en: And this is for Dad.
translation.zh: 这是爸爸的

translation.en: Are we starting a dance crew?
translation.zh: 我们是要成立舞蹈队吗？

translation.en: You wish we were starting a dance crew.
translation.zh: 你当然希望有那么简单

translation.en: [Carlos] Seriously, what are we doing?
translation.zh: 说真的 我们要干什么？

translation.en: [Allison] Are those water balloons?
translation.zh: 那些是水球吗？

translation.en: [Ellie] Kablowey!
translation.zh: 大混战！

translation.en: -[Nando] Yeah! -What's Kablowey?
translation.zh: -没错！-大混战是什么？

translation.en: It's capture the flag meets paintball meets a butt ton of Kool-Aid.
translation.zh: 那是夺旗和彩弹射击的结合 再加上大量的酷爱饮料

translation.en: A game Katie learned at camp. We played once with the kids in the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 是凯蒂在夏令营学到的游戏 我们和邻居家小孩玩过一次

translation.en: [Katie] Yeah, Mom was the first one out. It was so embarrassing.
translation.zh: 对 妈是第一个出局的 真是太丢人了

translation.en: [Nando] Only true warriors survive Kablowey.
translation.zh: 只有真正的勇士才能挺过大混战

translation.en: -It was a disaster. -Oh, but not today. Today we'll Kablowey.
translation.zh: 那次是一场灾难 但今天不是 今天我们会克敌制胜

translation.en: -Today we'll Kablowey. -Yes!
translation.zh: -我们会克敌制胜！-对！

translation.en: [Allison] Where did you come up with all of these people?
translation.zh: 你们是从哪儿找来这些人的？

translation.en: We told them there'd be a casting director for a new, sexy, romantic reality show.
translation.zh: 我们告诉他们有个导演会来 为新的性感浪漫真人秀进行选角

translation.en: That's you, Mom.
translation.zh: 那就是你 老妈

translation.en: Yeah, Insatiable Island.
translation.zh: 没错《心动夏令营》

translation.en: Come on, guys. Hey, guys!
translation.zh: 走吧 嘿 大家！

translation.en: [Allison] Insatiable Island? All right. I'm in it to win it. Let's do this!
translation.zh: 《心动夏令营》？ 好 我志在必胜 来吧！

translation.en: [Carlos] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Mr. Torres! You're on a Yes Day!
translation.zh: 托雷斯先生 你办了有求必应日！

translation.en: -Way to go! -Yeah, yeah. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: -好样的！-是啊 你怎么会在这里？

translation.en: Nando asked me to be here. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是南多让我来的

translation.en: -I'm gonna referee. -You don't know anything about sports.
translation.zh: 我是今天的裁判 你不是对体育一窍不通吗？

translation.en: I don't know anything about sports, but you can't say no on a Yes Day, right?
translation.zh: 我确实对体育一窍不通 但有求必应日不能说“不”嘛

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, get in your spot.
translation.zh: 好 够了 快就位

translation.en: [Nando] Any of you jocks scared?
translation.zh: 你们这些大块头害怕了吗？

translation.en: Well, you should be!
translation.zh: 你们是该害怕！

translation.en: Anybody who wants to go home to their mommy, now's your chance.
translation.zh: 谁想回家找妈咪的话就趁现在

translation.en: Sir? Who should I give my headshot to, sir?
translation.zh: 先生 我该把我的头像交给谁？

translation.en: Sir, I was a runner-up season 12 on The Bachelorette, in case that helps.
translation.zh: 先生 自我推销一下我是《单身女郎》第12季的亚军

translation.en: I was, uh, season 9.
translation.zh: 我是第9季的

translation.en: Season 13.
translation.zh: 我是第13季的

translation.en: Whatever!
translation.zh: 随便啦！

translation.en: Each team has a color of flag to protect. The goal is to catch the other team's flag
translation.zh: 各队都有不同颜色的旗子要保护 游戏的目标是夺取另一队的旗子

translation.en: without getting hit by their Kool-Aid balloons.
translation.zh: 并且不被对方的酷爱水球击中

translation.en: If you get Kablowey-ed, you're eliminated.
translation.zh: 如果中弹了 你就会被淘汰

translation.en: When one team has all the flags, game's over.
translation.zh: 当一队拿到所有的旗子时游戏就会结束

translation.en: Now, let's play some Kablowey!
translation.zh: 现在 让我们来场大混战吧！

translation.en: -[Allison] Big Blue! Big Blue! -[all] What? What?
translation.zh: -蓝色巨人！-什么？

translation.en: -[Allison] Break it down. -[all] What?
translation.zh: -来点节奏！-哈！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: That's enough of that. That's a little awkward for everyone.
translation.zh: 够了 搞得大家都有点尴尬了

translation.en: All right, guys, here we go.
translation.zh: 好 各位 我们开始吧

translation.en: Get your team's flag and protect it like it's tots!
translation.zh: 拿好你们的队旗把它当成炸薯球来保护！

translation.en: On the count of three, I want you to charge!
translation.zh: 我数到三 你们就冲

translation.en: Three, two…
translation.zh: 三、二…

translation.en: Wait. No, I screwed that up. Sorry.
translation.zh: 不 等等 我搞砸了 抱歉

translation.en: One, two…
translation.zh: 一、二…

translation.en: -three! -[screaming]
translation.zh: 三！

translation.en: Mom's our strongest enemy.
translation.zh: 妈是我们最强大的敌人

translation.en: Let's go get her!
translation.zh: 把她拿下！

translation.en: Don't worry about red.
translation.zh: 别担心红队

translation.en: My husband's on defense.
translation.zh: 我老公在打防守

translation.en: Don't worry about green. Katie's smart. She's gonna go after her dad. Run!
translation.zh: 也别担心绿队 凯蒂很聪明  她会冲着她爸去 快跑！

translation.en: Okay, guys. Okay, just… Defense is the key. Okay?
translation.zh: 好 各位 防守是关键 知道吗？

translation.en: Wait out here. Let them eliminate each other. I know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 在这儿等着 让他们互相消灭这招绝对错不了

translation.en: Go, go! Red team. Red team. My dad's team first!
translation.zh: 干掉红队 先干掉我爸那一队！

translation.en: This is gonna be easy.
translation.zh: 这也太容易了！

translation.en: You with the hair thing, outta here!
translation.zh: 头上有个东西的 出局！

translation.en: You in the headband, you're out!
translation.zh: 戴着头带的 你出局了！

translation.en: The other headband. [whistles]
translation.zh: 另一个戴着头带的

translation.en: -Should we take a selfie? -Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: -要不要来张自拍？-好啊

translation.en: -Sweet. -Tag me on Insta, 'kay?
translation.zh: -好棒-记得在IG上圈我哦

translation.en: -One, two, three. Insatiable Island! -Yeah!
translation.zh: 一、二、三 -《心动夏令营》-耶！

translation.en: Red team, what are you doing? It's a bloodbath!
translation.zh: 红队 你们在干嘛？ 这简直是场血战！

translation.en: Half your team is eliminated!
translation.zh: 你们一半的队员被淘汰了！

translation.en: Hold on. Change of strategy. Run for your life. Billy, get out of here!
translation.zh: 等等 改变战略 -赶紧逃命！-比利 快跑！

translation.en: I love the smell of Kool-Aid in the morning.
translation.zh: 我喜欢清晨空气中的酷爱饮料味道

translation.en: [Allison] Wait a minute. We're taking too many losses!
translation.zh: 等等 我们损失太惨重了！

translation.en: [whistles] You're out!
translation.zh: 你出局了！

translation.en: Too many casualties! Go back! Fall back!
translation.zh: 太多伤亡了！快撤退！

translation.en: Fall back, team!
translation.zh: 蓝队 撤退！

translation.en: New strategy.
translation.zh: 新战略

translation.en: Ma'am. Hi, my name's Eric.
translation.zh: 女士 你好 我是艾瑞克

translation.en: -I'm here to make muscles, not friends. -I'm more shredded. Check this out.
translation.zh: 我是来练肌肉的 不是来交友的 我的肌肉更发达 你看

translation.en: I have a very relatable body. It's great for TV.
translation.zh: 我的身材平易近人 有利于收视率

translation.en: For TV. Insatiable Island. Put your clothes on.
translation.zh: 原来是为了《心动夏令营》快穿好衣服

translation.en: We're getting killed. I need that bag.
translation.zh: 我们要被杀了 我需要那个袋子

translation.en: Load me up with ammo!
translation.zh: 给我装上弹药！

translation.en: -Get her ammo! -Bring it!
translation.zh: -给她弹药！-都拿来！

translation.en: Blue, who wiped your bottoms when you were babies?
translation.zh: 蓝队 你们小时候是谁给你们擦屁股的？

translation.en: -My mom! -Our moms!
translation.zh: -我妈妈！-我们的妈妈！

translation.en: -Who tied your shoes when you were babies? -Our moms!
translation.zh: 你们小时候是谁给你们绑鞋带的？ 我们的妈妈！

translation.en: Fight for your mom!
translation.zh: 为你们的妈妈而战！

translation.en: -Go, Blue! -Go, Blue!
translation.zh: -蓝队 上啊！-蓝队 上啊！

translation.en: Nando, look out!
translation.zh: 南多 小心！

translation.en: Nice job, Commander Ellie.
translation.zh: 干得好 指挥官爱丽

translation.en: Yay!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: You're out!
translation.zh: 你出局了！

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: Do you see them?
translation.zh: 看到他们了吗？

translation.en: Destroy my beautiful children!
translation.zh: 干掉我可爱的孩子们！

translation.en: You are going down!
translation.zh: 你们完蛋了！

translation.en: [Katie] Oh, this is bad.
translation.zh: 这下糟了

translation.en: You wanted to make me a warrior?
translation.zh: 你们想让我成为勇士 是吧？

translation.en: I'm a warrior!
translation.zh: 我就是个勇士！

translation.en: Listen, I think we need to team up to take her out.
translation.zh: 听着 我觉得我们得联手才能干掉她

translation.en: Deal. Is that fair?
translation.zh: -就这么定了-这样公平吗？

translation.en: All's fair in love and Kablowey.
translation.zh: 在爱情和大混战中没有什么是不公平的

translation.en: Go for it.
translation.zh: 扔吧

translation.en: That was perfect. It's messing her up.
translation.zh: 太棒了 你看 她完全乱了阵脚

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you playing dirty, Nando?
translation.zh: -是啊-南多 你耍阴招 是吧？

translation.en: [Nando] I don't see her. Where is she?
translation.zh: 我没看到她 她人呢？

translation.en: Do you see which way she went?
translation.zh: 你看到她往哪边走了吗？

translation.en: [Nando] No, I didn't. Let's go.
translation.zh: -没看到-走吧

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [coach] Oh wow! You got Kablowey-ed.
translation.zh: 哇哦 你中弹了！

translation.en: -Ah! -[coach] Ha-ha! You're done!
translation.zh: 你出局了！

translation.en: Mrs. Torres got the red flag!
translation.zh: 托雷斯女士拿到红旗了！

translation.en: If she gets the green flag, she wins!
translation.zh: 如果她拿到绿旗的话 她就赢了！

translation.en: -How'd you let that happen? -What?
translation.zh: -你怎么能让这种事发生？-哈？

translation.en: Hey, Brian, can I use your phone for a sec?
translation.zh: 嘿 布莱恩 能借用下你的手机吗？

translation.en: I just gotta deal with a work thing.
translation.zh: 我得处理一些工作上的事

translation.en: Will you put in a good word with your wife?
translation.zh: 能帮我跟你老婆说几句好话吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Wait. Hold up. Hold up.
translation.zh: 等等 等一下

translation.en: Mom, come on. It's over. You don't even have any balloons left.
translation.zh: 妈 别这样 已经结束了你连水球都没有了

translation.en: [in Spanish] Then why is there fear in your eyes, daughter?
translation.zh: 那你为何眼里充满了恐惧 女儿？

translation.en: [in Spanish] No, no, you have more fear.
translation.zh: 不 更害怕的是你

translation.en: Tú.
translation.zh: 你

translation.en: No. ¡Tú!
translation.zh: 不 你！

translation.en: -¡Tú! -¡Tú!
-[screams] -Wait!
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: That's my mom! That's my mom!
translation.zh: 那是我妈妈！

translation.en: Whoo! We did it!
translation.zh: 我们成功了！

translation.en: [in Spanish] Blue forever!
translation.zh: 蓝色万岁！

translation.en: [in English] Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: We shipped the nano-cams? We don't have clearance yet.
translation.zh: 纳米相机都运出去了？什么意思？我们还没得到许可呢

translation.en: Tell Alan to issue a recall.
translation.zh: 让艾伦发布召回令

translation.en: -[Ellie] Daddy? -Honey.
translation.zh: -爸爸？-亲爱的

translation.en: -Were you talking on a phone? -No. Phone? No, no.
translation.zh: -你刚刚是在讲电话吗？-电话？没有啊

translation.en: I was just out here looking at… Taking in the nature. I love nature.
translation.zh: 我只是在这里欣赏大自然而已我超爱大自然的

translation.en: -Well, it looked like you were. -Nope, I wasn't.
translation.zh: 可你看起来像在讲电话 不 我没有

translation.en: -No. -Daddy, do you hear that?
translation.zh: -没有-爸爸 你听到了吗？

translation.en: -What? -It must be coming from that bush.
translation.zh: -听到什么？-一定是从那个树丛里传出来的

translation.en: Oh, she fell out of her nest.
translation.zh: 它从窝里掉出来了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: We have to put her back.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我们得把它放回去

translation.en: -What? -I thought you loved nature.
translation.zh: -什么？-你不是超爱大自然吗？

translation.en: Yeah, honey, but it's a very tall tree.
translation.zh: 是 亲爱的 但这棵树很高耶

translation.en: If you help the birdie, Daddy,
translation.zh: 爸爸 你把小鸟送回家

translation.en: I won't tell anyone I saw you talking on a phone.
translation.zh: 我就不会告诉任何人我看到你讲电话了

translation.en: Wait, wait. Ah. [grunts]
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: [Ellie] Come on, Daddy! Hurry up!
translation.zh: 来吧 爸爸 快点！

translation.en: Oh, they're a family again, honey.
translation.zh: 它们一家团聚了 亲爱的

translation.en: Yay, Daddy!
translation.zh: 太棒了 爸爸！

translation.en: It was actually a good idea, honey. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这其实是个好主意 亲爱的 谢谢你

translation.en: [screams] What's this?
translation.zh: 搞什么啊？

translation.en: She thinks you're stealing her babies!
translation.zh: 它以为你要偷它的宝宝们

translation.en: We were just trying to help!
translation.zh: 我们只是想帮忙而已！

translation.en: Allison, baby!
translation.zh: 艾莉森 亲爱的！

translation.en: Allison!
translation.zh: 艾莉森！

translation.en: -[Ellie] Come down, Daddy! -I'm coming down, honey!
translation.zh: 爸爸 快下来！ 我要下去了 宝贝！

translation.en: Ooh. You okay, Daddy?
translation.zh: 你没事吧 爸爸？

translation.en: Yeah, honey.
translation.zh: 没事 亲爱的

translation.en: I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: Oh my God! Stop!
translation.zh: 我的天啊 停下来！

translation.en: Stop! Call your mom!
translation.zh: 快去叫你妈妈！

translation.en: See? I'm not always a fun killer.
translation.zh: 你看 我并不总是个乐趣杀手

translation.en: Well, not today you aren't.
translation.zh: 你今天确实不是

translation.en: Mom, there's no way you'll make it through the day.
translation.zh: 妈 你不可能撑得过一整天的

translation.en: -I'm still saying yes, aren't I? -[Carlos] Call 911!
translation.zh: 我一次“不”都没说过耶 快叫救护车！

translation.en: -Allison! -Is that Dad?
translation.zh: -艾莉森！-那是爸爸吗？

translation.en: Yup, that's him.
translation.zh: 对 是他

translation.en: Your brother's taking you to get dry ice, right?
translation.zh: 放学后你哥会带你去买干冰 对吧？

translation.en: We're good. By the way, so many people are coming tonight.
translation.zh: 包在我身上 对了 今晚有好多人会来

translation.en: It's gonna be awesome.
translation.zh: 一定会超棒的

translation.en: [Nando] Fantastic.
translation.zh: 妙极了

translation.en: Are you sure you need that much baking soda?
translation.zh: 你确定你需要这么多苏打粉吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's a better catalyst.
translation.zh: 对 那是更好的催化剂

translation.en: Trust me. I'm an expert on catalysts now.
translation.zh: 相信我 我现在是催化剂专家了

translation.en: -Allison! Call 911! -I'll have to call you right back.
translation.zh: 艾莉森 快叫救护车！ 我待会儿再打给你

translation.en: Call 911!
translation.zh: 叫救护车！

translation.en: We need a doctor, stat! There's been a horrific bird attack.
translation.zh: 我们需要医生 立刻马上！ 有人遭到了可怕的鸟袭击！

translation.en: What? Do I have rabies?
translation.zh: 什么？我得了狂犬病吗？

translation.en: No, this hospital sucks, so I exaggerated a little to goose 'em. No pun intended.
translation.zh: 不 这家医院太差劲了 所以我夸大了点 让他们倾巢出动没双关意思哦

translation.en: -She's kidding. You're kidding, right? -Sure.
translation.zh: 她开玩笑的 你在开玩笑 对吧？ 呃 当然

translation.en: Here's a waiting room.
translation.zh: 这里有间候诊室

translation.en: -Katie, you are in charge. -Okay.
translation.zh: -凯蒂 交给你了-好的

translation.en: Everybody stay with her, so I can find you later.
translation.zh: 大家和她待在一起好方便我一会儿找你们

translation.en: -Hurry up! Hurry up! Hurry up! -Stay. It's okay.
translation.zh: -快点！-在这儿待着 没事的

translation.en: Okay, Mr. Torres, you can relax.
translation.zh: 好了 托雷斯先生 你可以放松了

translation.en: The scratches are superficial. You'll be fine.
translation.zh: 这些抓痕只是皮外伤 你会没事的

translation.en: Oh good. So no concussion, no rabies, no bruises? He's good to go?
translation.zh: 太好了 所以没有脑震荡、狂犬病或瘀伤咯？他可以走了？

translation.en: He's in the clear.
translation.zh: 他没事

translation.en: -I'll send in a nurse to discharge you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -我会请护士给你办出院手续-谢谢你

translation.en: -You're okay. That's great. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你没事 太好了-嗯

translation.en: I will get the kids, and you take your time.
translation.zh: 我先去找孩子们 你慢慢来

translation.en: Honey, I hate to be a party pooper, but my body's done.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我不想扫大家的兴但我身体受不了了

translation.en: Can we finish this another day, please?
translation.zh: 我们能改天再继续吗 拜托？

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: Yeah, I guess if you're not feeling well, of course we'll go home.
translation.zh: 好吧 你要是觉得不舒服我们当然可以回家

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Allison] Gosh.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-天哪

translation.en: Maybe I'll pop by the office, then go home and crash.
translation.zh: 也许我会顺便去一下办公室然后回家倒头大睡

translation.en: -Sorry. What'd you say? -Hm?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Maybe I'll pop by the office.
translation.zh: 也许我会顺便去一下办公室

translation.en: So you don't feel well enough to finish this day for our family,
translation.zh: 所以你觉得不舒服不能为咱们家完成这一天

translation.en: but you do feel well enough to pop by the office.
translation.zh: 但却能顺便去一下办公室

translation.en: It's a little crisis that happened this morning.
translation.zh: 就只是今早发生的小危机

translation.en: Carlos, you want to cancel this day, that's your choice,
translation.zh: 卡洛斯 你想取消这一天那是你的选择

translation.en: but you're telling the kids.
translation.zh: 但你自己去告诉孩子们

translation.en: [in Spanish] It's your turn to be the bad guy.
translation.zh: 这次该轮到你当坏人了

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. T. Hey, get this.
translation.zh: 托雷斯女士 听听这个

translation.en: I told Karen I'd give her a Yes Day, and she doesn't even want it.
translation.zh: 我跟凯伦说要给她一个有求必应日但她竟然不要

translation.en: We have an ambulance with a siren.
translation.zh: 我们有辆带警笛的救护车

translation.en: Think of the possibilities.
translation.zh: 想想我们都能做些什么

translation.en: Grow up, Jean. Seriously.
translation.zh: 成熟点吧 吉恩 说认真的

translation.en: How about you lighten up, Karen?
translation.zh: 你别那么较真如何 凯伦？

translation.en: Take a chill pill.
translation.zh: 你就放松点儿会死么？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I… I just got into a fight with my husband.
translation.zh: 还好 我只是刚跟我老公吵架了

translation.en: Ah, and you want me to beat him up?
translation.zh: 哦 你想让我揍他一顿吗？

translation.en: No, nothing like that.
translation.zh: 不 不是那样的

translation.en: [Jean] Give him a wedgie?
translation.zh: 扯内裤处罚他？

translation.en: No, no. It's just that today was the first day in, like, a year
translation.zh: 不是 只是今天是我这一年来第一次觉得

translation.en: where I felt like we were really in it together.
translation.zh: 只是今天是我这一年来第一次觉得 我们一家人真的是一条心

translation.en: -[Jean] Yeah. -And then he just had to go and be a wuss.
translation.zh: -明白-但他却非得要当个怂包

translation.en: Sounds like Karen.
translation.zh: 听起来就像凯伦

translation.en: She's mad because I took our life savings and bought a fleet of ambulances.
translation.zh: 她很生气我用去们的毕生积蓄买了一队救护车

translation.en: I barely know how to drive this one.
translation.zh: 而我连这一辆都开不好

translation.en: But you can't force people to change.
translation.zh: 但你不能强迫别人改变

translation.en: You gotta do what works for you,
translation.zh: 你得做让自己开心的事

translation.en: and he can either join the party, or it's his loss. You know?
translation.zh: 他要么加入不然就是他的损失 知道吧？

translation.en: That's so true.
translation.zh: 说得太对了

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿 大家

translation.en: Honey, can I talk to you for a second?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 能和你谈一下吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Look, I… I feel real bad.
translation.zh: 听着 我心里很难受

translation.en: I don't want to be the spoiler here.
translation.zh: 我不想当扫兴鬼

translation.en: Well, don't feel bad. You are not the spoiler. You do you.
translation.zh: 别觉得难受嘛 你不是扫兴鬼 做你想做的

translation.en: You can either come to this party or not.
translation.zh: 你可以选择加入 也可以不加入

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Hey guys, let me see what you got. Big ask number four. Let me see.
translation.zh: 来吧 让我看看神秘任务四是什么

translation.en: Okay, number four. Putts N' Stuff.
translation.zh: 好 任务四 迷你高尔夫游乐园

translation.en: That'd be very cool. We'd have a great time.
translation.zh: 不错哦 我们会玩得很开心的

translation.en: But it does not compare
translation.zh: 但那根本比不上…

translation.en: to Magic Mountain!
translation.zh: 去魔法山乐园！

translation.en: -What? -Whoo!
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: But wait. What about the distance rule?
translation.zh: 等等 那距离规则呢？

translation.en: I've decided to make an exception.
translation.zh: 我决定破例一次

translation.en: And your dad has something he wants to say.
translation.zh: 对了 你们爸爸有话想说

translation.en: Go ahead, Dad.
translation.zh: 说吧 爸

translation.en: Well, guys, I'm feeling, um…
translation.zh: 那个 我觉得…

translation.en: I'm… I'm feeling a little…
translation.zh: 我觉得有点…

translation.en: I'm feeling a little bit sick.
translation.zh: 我觉得有点不舒服

translation.en: You're sick?
translation.zh: 你生病了？

translation.en: Are you going home?
translation.zh: 你要回家了吗？

translation.en: I think I might be coming down with Magic Mountain fever!
translation.zh: 我想我可能染上了魔法山乐园热潮！

translation.en: -But how are we gonna get there? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -但我们要怎么到那里？-是啊

translation.en: Because the SUV is at the Kablowey field, and even with traffic, it'll take forever.
translation.zh: 车还在大混战场那里 再加上交通 也不知何时才能抵达

translation.en: Uh, duh. It's Yes Day!
translation.zh: 拜托 今天是有求必应日耶！

translation.en: Are we ready for some roller coaster madness?
translation.zh: 大家准备好坐疯狂的过山车了吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
translation.zh: -准备好了！-耶！

translation.en: Just so we're clear, if an emergency comes in,
translation.zh: 先说清楚 如果有紧急状况的话

translation.en: I gotta leave you on the side of the road.

Don't you guys get it?
