translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Dude, I cannot believe your parents are in jail.
translation.zh: 伙计 真不敢相信你父母被抓进牢了

translation.en: It's crazy, right?
translation.zh: 太疯狂了吧？

translation.en: Are we really just gonna leave Mom and Dad?
translation.zh: 我们真的要丢下爸妈吗？

translation.en: It's not our fault they got put in the clink on our Yes Day.
translation.zh: 他们在有求必应日被关进牢房又不是我们的错

translation.en: But we're not supposed to get rides from strangers.
translation.zh: 但我们不应该上陌生人的车

translation.en: Okay, well, you guys know Layla,
translation.zh: 是 可你们认识蕾拉嘛

translation.en: and Julie is Layla's cousin.
translation.zh: 而朱莉是蕾拉的表姐

translation.en: I mean, look, they even put in a car seat.
translation.zh: 你看 她们还安装了安全座椅

translation.en: Think of the upside to this.
translation.zh: 大家 想想这有什么好处

translation.en: Now your big main event can be even bigger.
translation.zh: 这下你们的重头戏可以更夸张了

translation.en: -Awesome. -What is this?
translation.zh: -棒呆了-这是什么？

translation.en: What's with all the tubes and buckets?
translation.zh: 那么多管子和水桶是怎么回事？

translation.en: -It's just a nerd party. Hey, guys! -[kids chanting] Nando!
translation.zh: -就只是个学霸派对-南多！ 嘿 大家！

translation.en: I feel like this is something that we should have talked…
translation.zh: 我觉得这事我们应该事先商量…

translation.en: [Nando] Hey, wait up! Let's get the party started!
translation.zh: 嘿 等一下 让派对开始吧！

translation.en: [gasps] You look pretty!
translation.zh: 你看起来好漂亮！

translation.en: Thanks, Ellie.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 爱丽

translation.en: [sighs] I can't go.
translation.zh: 我不能去

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I can't go.
translation.zh: 我不能去

translation.en: I'm sorry. I can't leave them. What if something happens?
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我不能丢下他们万一出什么事呢？

translation.en: I'm the oldest. It's my responsibility.
translation.zh: 我是长女 这是我的责任

translation.en: But you've wanted to go to this concert forever.
translation.zh: 但你一直都很想去看这场演唱会

translation.en: And we're gonna be fine. We won't make poor decisions. Promise.
translation.zh: 我们会没事的我们绝不会做蠢事 我发誓

translation.en: Promise to text me if something happens?
translation.zh: 你发誓如果出事的话会给我发短信？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: Come on, Katie. The guys are already there.
translation.zh: 来嘛 凯蒂 男孩们已经在那里了

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Be safe, please.
translation.zh: 注意安全啊

translation.en: -[Allison] Are the kids okay? -[officer] Yes.
translation.zh: -孩子们还好吧？-还好

translation.en: And I have some phenomenal news.
translation.zh: 而且我有个很棒的消息

translation.en: The park's not pressing charges.
translation.zh: 乐园不打算起诉你们

translation.en: -Thank God. -Yes!
translation.zh: -谢天谢地-太好了

translation.en: They looked at some security footage, and it turns out you did win the gorilla.
translation.zh: 他们看了监控录像发现你确实赢了这只大猩猩

translation.en: I knew it. I knew I won this gorilla. I knew I--
translation.zh: 我就知道我就知道我赢了这只大猩猩

translation.en: [Carlos] Okay.
translation.zh: -我就知道…-好了

translation.en: -Does she get to go too? -[officer] In a little bit.
translation.zh: 她也能走吗？ 再过一会儿

translation.en: Oh gosh. Here, you have it.
translation.zh: 天啊 喏 给你吧

translation.en: You take the "golilla."
translation.zh: 大晶晶是你的

translation.en: You won it fair and square.
translation.zh: 是你堂堂正正赢来的

translation.en: -Thank you. -[officer] Let's go.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-走吧

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: -Katie? -[Carlos] Nando?
translation.zh: -凯蒂？-南多？

translation.en: Ellie? Where are our kids?
translation.zh: 爱丽？我们的孩子呢？

translation.en: Sorry, I forgot to tell you. Nana and Pop-Pop picked them up.
translation.zh: 抱歉 忘了告诉你爱婆和爱公把他们接走了

translation.en: Nana and Pop-Pop live in Pittsburgh.
translation.zh: 爱婆和爱公住在匹兹堡

translation.en: But they're here on vacation?
translation.zh: 但他们来度假了吧？

translation.en: -No, they're not. -You let our children leave by themselves?
translation.zh: 没有 你让我们的孩子自己离开了？

translation.en: You see, when you say it out loud, I… I realize that it was a mistake.
translation.zh: 现在听你这么一说我意识到那是个错误了

translation.en: -[gasps] -Oh no.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Can you believe this?
translation.zh: 你能相信吗？

translation.en: We are actually pulling it off. I'm gonna go check on the big surprise.
translation.zh: 我们真的做到了耶我先去看一下大惊喜

translation.en: Yeah. Okay. I'll see you over there, man.
translation.zh: 哦 好的 我们一会儿那里见

translation.en: Who's ready to make some science miracles?
translation.zh: 谁准备好创造些科学奇迹了？

translation.en: -Name? -Hailey Peterson.
translation.zh: -名字？-海莉皮特森

translation.en: I live across the street.
translation.zh: 我就住在街对面

translation.en: Sorry, not on the list.
translation.zh: 抱歉 你不在名单上

translation.en: Just kidding. I can't even read. Get on in here.
translation.zh: 开玩笑的啦 我又不识字 进来吧

translation.en: -Yes. -[Nando] Are you ready?
translation.zh: -耶！-准备好了吗？

translation.en: [all] Go, Nando! Go, Nando! Go, Nando! Go, Nando! Go, Nando!
translation.zh: 加油 南多！

translation.en: Nando's not picking up either.
translation.zh: 南多也不接电话

translation.en: We know Katie's at Fleekfest, so Nando and Ellie must be at the main event?
translation.zh: 我们知道凯蒂去了闪光音乐节那南多和爱丽肯定是在搞重头戏吧？

translation.en: Whatever that is.
translation.zh: 天知道那是什么

translation.en: Your kids left this here. Do you mean this main event?
translation.zh: 他们留下了这个你是说这个重头戏吗？

translation.en: Nerd party. Where would you throw a nerd party?
translation.zh: 学霸派对 你会在哪里开学霸派对？

translation.en: He's 11. He's throwing it at home.
translation.zh: 他才11岁 当然是在家开

translation.en: We have to divide and conquer here.
translation.zh: 我们必须分而治之

translation.en: I go to the house and shut down the party.
translation.zh: 我会回家结束那场派对

translation.en: You realize you're gonna have to be a bad guy to a bunch of kids.
translation.zh: 你知道你将成为一大帮孩子眼中的坏人吧？

translation.en: I know. I got this.
translation.zh: 我知道 交给我吧

translation.en: -Thanks for the extra ticket. -Oh yeah, of course.
translation.zh: 谢谢你把多余的票给我 哦 不客气

translation.en: Well, my mom can't use it anymore 'cause she's in jail, so…
translation.zh: 反正我妈也用不着了因为她在监牢里

translation.en: This is so sick.
translation.zh: 这炫爆了

translation.en: -Hey. -[Julie] What's up?
translation.zh: -嘿-哟

translation.en: -What's going on? -What's up?
translation.zh: -怎么样？-你好啊

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -Katie. -Layla.
translation.zh: -凯蒂-蕾拉

translation.en: Chase.
translation.zh: 查斯

translation.en: Rob. Killer shirt.
translation.zh: 罗伯 这上衣真帅

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -How's it coming, dude? -Almost done.
translation.zh: -弄得怎么样了 老兄？-快好了

translation.en: Once you get everybody in the backyard, text me, and we'll add the catalyst.
translation.zh: 一旦你把所有人都叫到后院就给我发短信 我们就加催化剂

translation.en: -Don't forget the tubes. -I got it.
translation.zh: -别忘了管子-知道了

translation.en: This is gonna be awesome!
translation.zh: 这一定会超赞！

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Tell Nando's mom I'm never having a Yes Day, honey.
translation.zh: 告诉南多的妈妈我永远都不会办有求必应日

translation.en: Okay, Mom.
translation.zh: 好的 妈

translation.en: Hey, look, I… I love flaring up my siren and just absolutely flying through town.
translation.zh: 嘿 听着我也喜欢拉着警笛在路上狂奔

translation.en: We're going very fast.
translation.zh: 我们开得很快呢

translation.en: But I think maybe you might be overreacting a little bit.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你可能反应过度了点

translation.en: This is a girl who is angry with her mother,
translation.zh: 这个女孩生她妈妈的气

translation.en: and she's meeting up with some skeegy guys who probably have a mustache and need to shave.
translation.zh: 并且要去跟一些大概长了满脸胡子的肉渣男会面

translation.en: I don't know if you know anything about teenagers,
translation.zh: 我不知道你对青少年了解多少

translation.en: but this is a recipe for putting yourself in a horrible situation.
translation.zh: 但这二者结合将致使他们做出些可怕的事

translation.en: I've never heard of "skeegy," but they sound bad.
translation.zh: 我没听说过肉渣男 但听起来渣透了

translation.en: -You know what? I won this bet. -Yes.
translation.zh: -你知道么？我赢了这场赌约-是

translation.en: I won this ticket fair and square, and she stole it from me.
translation.zh: 我堂堂正正赢了这张票她却从我这里偷走

translation.en: I did not say no on Yes Day. That was the deal.
translation.zh: 我在有求必应日一次“不”都没说过 我们说好的

translation.en: It's my first actual ride in this car.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次坐这辆车

translation.en: -Do you need me to drive? -No, I'm good. I am a grown man.
translation.zh: 你需要我来开吗？ 不需要 我可是个成年男人

translation.en: [helium voice] Yo! Yo! Yo!
translation.zh: 哟！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: -You wanna fight? Let's go! -Hey, guys! Guys, that's not cool.
translation.zh: -你想打架？来啊！-伙计们！ 你们别这样

translation.en: I'm gonna get you.
translation.zh: 看我不打倒你

translation.en: -[Nando] Come on. Stop! -[glass shatters]
translation.zh: 够了 住手！

translation.en: You broke the lamp.
translation.zh: 你们把灯打破了

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 住手！

translation.en: No! What are you doing?
translation.zh: 不！你在干什么？

translation.en: Come on, Tyler!
translation.zh: 够了 泰勒！

translation.en: Ellie, don't open that.
translation.zh: 爱丽 别打开瓶子

translation.en: I love science!
translation.zh: 我爱科学！

translation.en: I've never even had soda. My parents don't let me.
translation.zh: 我从没喝过汽水 我爸妈不让我喝

translation.en: Ellie!
translation.zh: 爱丽！

translation.en: -[shouting] -This is so awesome!
translation.zh: 这真是太棒了！

translation.en: Stop! We have to get this party under control!
translation.zh: 快住手！我们得把这派对控制住！

translation.en: How can that be fun? I thought this was the main event.
translation.zh: 那有什么好玩的？这不是重头戏吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it is, but look at this.
translation.zh: 是 没错 但你看看这团糟

translation.en: [Nando] Everybody, come to the backyard.
translation.zh: 大家都到后院来

translation.en: The main event is in the backyard.
translation.zh: 重头戏将在后院进行

translation.en: [officer] How will we find her? They're all dressed like animals.
translation.zh: 要怎么找到她啊？大家都打扮得像毛皮兽

translation.en: -Get to the stage. -Okay.
translation.zh: -去找舞台-好的

translation.en: -Move! Move! Go! Go! -I'm looking for my daughter!
translation.zh: -让开！快去！-我在找我女儿！

translation.en: -It's worse than I thought. -My ankles are weak.
translation.zh: -这比我想的还糟-我的脚没力气

translation.en: -Hey. -Where were you?
translation.zh: -嘿-你去哪了？

translation.en: Julie got us set up at the tent. We're gonna hang there.
translation.zh: 朱莉给我们弄到了帐篷我们要去那里呆着

translation.en: Why are we going to a tent?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要去帐篷？

translation.en: Come on, Katie. Don't be lame.
translation.zh: 拜托 凯蒂 别那么无趣

translation.en: Well, we just met those guys.
translation.zh: 我们才刚认识那些男孩

translation.en: They could be shady.
translation.zh: 万一他们不老实呢？

translation.en: Layla, I can't.
translation.zh: 蕾拉 我不能

translation.en: It doesn't feel right.
translation.zh: 这样感觉不对

translation.en: Guess I'll see you later, then?
translation.zh: 那就回头见吧？

translation.en: -Excuse us, please. -Katie?
translation.zh: -不好意思 请让让-凯蒂？

translation.en: -Katie? -[woman] Hey!
translation.zh: -凯蒂？-喂！

translation.en: Okay. I'm so sorry. She's just freaking out.
translation.zh: 好啦 抱歉 她只是担心坏了 好吗？

translation.en: [Allison] I see a security guard.
translation.zh: 我看到保安了

translation.en: -Great. -Show him your badge.
translation.zh: -太好了-给他看你的警徽

translation.en: -Excuse me, sir? -[officer] Sir?
translation.zh: -不好意思 先生-先生

translation.en: My daughter is here without my permission. I need to find her.
translation.zh: 我女儿未经我的允许就来了 我必须找到她

translation.en: No problem.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: I'll just put her photo up on the Jumbotron.
translation.zh: 我会把她的照片放到大屏幕上的

translation.en: Thank you so much. Thank you.
translation.zh: 太好了 非常谢谢你

translation.en: He's being sarcastic. Smart aleck.
translation.zh: 他是在讽刺我 爱贫嘴

translation.en: -Katie Torres? -[singer] Thank you! Good night!
translation.zh: -凯蒂托雷斯？-谢谢 祝大家晚安！

translation.en: I need to get up on that stage.
translation.zh: 我需要上台去

translation.en: No, that's where the musicians go, Allison.
translation.zh: 那里全是歌手 艾莉森

translation.en: No, no, she'll be so angry with me that then she'll have to come down,
translation.zh: 不 那会让她非常生气到时她就不得不现身

translation.en: and then we'll have her, and nothing else could go wrong.
translation.zh: 我们就能找到她然后就不会出任何事了

translation.en: But what if she hates you forever?
translation.zh: 如果她为此恨你一辈子呢？

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay, uh.
translation.zh: -好-那好吧

translation.en: What is this miracle powder?
translation.zh: 这个神奇的粉是什么啊？

translation.en: Sugar.
translation.zh: 糖

translation.en: [Hailey] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇塞

translation.en: [Nando] The main event is out there.
translation.zh: 重头戏就在外面

translation.en: I have a big surprise.
translation.zh: 我有个大惊喜

translation.en: Everybody in the backyard!
translation.zh: 所有人都到后院去！

translation.en: Hey, that's my parents' wedding album.
translation.zh: 那是我爸妈的结婚相册

translation.en: -Who cares? Your parents are in jail. -I said no!
translation.zh: 管它呢 反正你父母在坐牢 我说了不行！

translation.en: -I thought it was Yes Day. -Stop!
translation.zh: -今天不是有求必应日么？-放手！

translation.en: Oh no. What have I done?
translation.zh: 天啊 我到底做了什么？

translation.en: Time for the surprise!
translation.zh: 惊喜时间到！

translation.en: No! No! Ellie! Come back!
translation.zh: 不！爱丽！回来！

translation.en: No surprise!
translation.zh: 不要惊喜！

translation.en: I'm gonna do it.
translation.zh: 我要倒进去咯

translation.en: Ellie, no.
translation.zh: 爱丽 不要

translation.en: But it's Yes Day.
translation.zh: 但今天是有求必应日

translation.en: [Nando] Ellie.
translation.zh: 爱丽

translation.en: Give me the catalyst.
translation.zh: 把催化剂给我

translation.en: I wanna see foam.
translation.zh: 我想看泡沫

translation.en: You will, I promise.
translation.zh: 你会看到的 我保证

translation.en: But we just need to attach the tubes so it sprays into the backyard.
translation.zh: 但我们得先接上管子让它喷到后院去

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: But hurry.
translation.zh: 但快点

translation.en: -[fizzing] -[both] No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: -Oh my gosh. -[screaming]
translation.zh: 我的天哪

translation.en: Whoops.
translation.zh: 哎呦

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't tighten the lids, but at least it works.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我没把盖子拧紧但至少它奏效了

translation.en: Yeah, in the house.
translation.zh: 是 但在屋里耶

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: [Nando] My parents are gonna kill me.
translation.zh: 我爸妈会杀了我的

translation.en: Guys, Nando set off a foam bomb upstairs!
translation.zh: 大家 南多在楼上点燃了泡沫炸弹！

translation.en: Whoa, it's coming down the stairs.
translation.zh: 天啊 快流下楼梯了

translation.en: -[Ellie] It's so much. -Come on, guys.
translation.zh: -这也太多了-来吧 伙计们

translation.en: It's gonna eat us!
translation.zh: 它会把我们吃了！

translation.en: Don't worry! It's all simple products you'd find in your kitchen.
translation.zh: 别担心 都是些你能在厨房里找到的简单产品

translation.en: Noo!
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: Fire in the hole!
translation.zh: 要爆炸啦！

translation.en: [Ellie] Go, Nando!
translation.zh: 南多 加油！

translation.en: [Nando] Stop! No!
translation.zh: 不 停下来！

translation.en: My God!
translation.zh: 我的天哪

translation.en: This is not cool, guys! Come on!
translation.zh: 大家 这一点也不好玩！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: ♪ This is gonna be The best day of my life… ♪
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: No! Stop throwing foam!
translation.zh: 不行！别再扔泡沫了！

translation.en: Please, stop!
translation.zh: 拜托你们停下来！

translation.en: Tasha!
translation.zh: 塔莎！

translation.en: What are you doing in Cleveland?
translation.zh: 你怎么会来克利夫兰啊？

translation.en: I'm not Tasha, and we're not in Cleveland. I'm sorry. I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我不是塔莎 我们也不在克利夫兰抱歉 我得走了

translation.en: No! No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Does anybody have a charger? Do you have a charger?
translation.zh: 有谁有充电器吗？你们有充电器吗？

translation.en: -I've never been backstage. -We're close.
translation.zh: -我是第一次来后台-快到了

translation.en: Stay focused on getting out there.
translation.zh: -我真的好兴奋-专注于走到台上

translation.en: -We need to get past this guy. -[officer] I got it.
translation.zh: -我们只需绕过这家伙-知道了

translation.en: -Whoa, whoa. -Fellow man of the law. I appreciate…
translation.zh: 这位执法界同僚 真心感谢…

translation.en: -Should we run past him? -No, definitely not.
translation.zh: -我们要直接冲过去吗？-绝对不行

translation.en: I don't care. Tell him.
translation.zh: 我不在乎 告诉他

translation.en: I'm like, "We're going on in five minutes."
translation.zh: 我说咱们再过五分钟就要上场了

translation.en: And that's H.E.R. Oh, my gosh, it's H.E.R.
translation.zh: 那是H.E.R. 我的天哪 是H.E.R.

translation.en: -What do you mean? -It's H.E.R.
translation.zh: -什么意思？-你看 是H.E.R.

translation.en: Capital "H" H.E.R. Oh my God!
translation.zh: 是那个H.E.R.耶 我的天哪

translation.en: We don't care. We're around celebrities all day, so…
translation.zh: 我们才不在乎 我们常跟明星打交道

translation.en: Billie, I ripped my top. I need a seamstress, like, ASAP.
translation.zh: 比莉 我把上衣划破了你得尽快给我找个女裁缝

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, do we have any seamstresses backstage?
translation.zh: 好吧 嘿 我们后台有没有女裁缝？

translation.en: Sure, sure.
translation.zh: 有

translation.en: At least get me a sewing kit.
translation.zh: 至少给我找个针线包嘛

translation.en: -[gasping] -I have a sewing kit.
translation.zh: 我有针线包

translation.en: She's got… We're coming in.
translation.zh: 她有 我们要进去了

translation.en: -I have a sewing kit. All the colors. -[officer] She's got it. Very safe.
translation.zh: -我有针线包 真的-没错 -什么颜色都有-非常安全

translation.en: -I can sew it. -You okay with that?
translation.zh: -你愿意的话 我能帮你缝-你可以吧？

translation.en: -Yes! -Fantastic.
translation.zh: -当然！-太好了

translation.en: -Thank you so much. Thank you. -I got it.
translation.zh: -太谢谢你了-我接住了 谢谢

translation.en: I like to stay prepared. I have three kids.
translation.zh: 我喜欢有所准备 我有三个孩子

translation.en: You never know when something comes up.
translation.zh: 你永远不知道什么时候会有事发生

translation.en: Listen, I have to tell you, my daughter and I are such huge fans
translation.zh: 听着 我得告诉你我和我女儿是你的超级粉丝

translation.en: and so grateful for your artistry.
translation.zh: 我们真有幸能欣赏你的作品

translation.en: We know everything about you.
translation.zh: 我们知道关于你的一切

translation.en: -[H.E.R.] Wow. -Like a stalker. [laughs]
translation.zh: -哇-像跟踪狂一样

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you so much, and thank you for hooking me up.
translation.zh: 真的很谢谢你 也谢谢你帮我这个忙

translation.en: You don't know how much of a lifesaver you are now.
translation.zh: 你根本不知道你帮了我多的大忙

translation.en: You should be in good shape. Hang on. Sorry.
translation.zh: 应该没问题了 等一下 不好意思

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: I am so sorry to bother you, and I hope this isn't inappropriate, but…
translation.zh: 很抱歉麻烦你也希望这要求不会太过分 但…

translation.en: I need you to hook me up.
translation.zh: 我需要你帮我个忙

translation.en: It doesn't look that bad.
translation.zh: 看上去没那么糟嘛

translation.en: -Thanks for the ride, officer. -[officer] Okay.
translation.zh: -谢谢你送我一程 警官-不客气

translation.en: Nando?
translation.zh: 南多？

translation.en: Ellie! What's going on?
translation.zh: 爱丽！这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Nando!
translation.zh: 南多！

translation.en: This party's over!
translation.zh: 派对结束了！

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 停下来！

translation.en: -Stop! -[Nando] Dad!
translation.zh: -停下来！-爸！

translation.en: [shouting] I said stop!
translation.zh: 我叫你们停下来！

translation.en: Yay, Daddy!
translation.zh: 爸爸 好棒！

translation.en: Kids… [heavy breathing]
translation.zh: 孩子们

translation.en: …this is my house, and I'm telling you the party's over.
translation.zh: 这是我家 我说派对结束了 好吗？

translation.en: Okay? Where do you think you're going?
translation.zh: 我说派对结束了 好吗？ 你们想去哪？

translation.en: I said the party's over, but the cleanup starts now!
translation.zh: 我说派对结束了但清理从现在开始！

translation.en: Start to clean. Now! Gather all the foam! Take it to the backyard.
translation.zh: 开始清理 快点！ 把泡沫都弄到后院去

translation.en: Come on. Come on, kids.
translation.zh: 动起来 孩子们！

translation.en: Go, go, go! Ellie, get off the table, please, my love.
translation.zh: 快点！爱丽 从桌上下来 拜托

translation.en: [in Spanish] Come on! Everybody! Help everybody else!
translation.zh: 快点 大家！互相帮忙！

translation.en: [in English] I'm so incredibly jazzed about tonight.
translation.zh: 我超期待今晚的演唱会的

translation.en: Yeah. This is my eighth consecutive Fleekfest.
translation.zh: 对 这是我连续第八次参加闪光音乐节

translation.en: One year I got sick from nacho cheese,
translation.zh: 有一年我吃了太多奶酪酱有点不舒服

translation.en: but other than that, I've been to every one.
translation.zh: 但除此之外 我几乎每年都到场

translation.en: That's a lot of people. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 好多人啊

translation.en: I panicked at my karate recital. That was only two people in front of me.
translation.zh: 我表演空手道时只有两个观众我都紧张死了

translation.en: Do you have a charger? My phone just died. Sorry.
translation.zh: 你有充电器吗？我手机没电了 不好意思

translation.en: Do you have a charger? My phone died. I wanna get home.
translation.zh: 你有充电器吗？我手机没电了 我想回家

translation.en: -You wanna go home? -I wanna go home.
translation.zh: -你想回家呀？-对 我想回家

translation.en: -[laughs] -Now you're home.
translation.zh: 现在这里就是你家了

translation.en: What? Why would you do that? Why?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这么做？为什么？

translation.en: We go on in two minutes, so now's your chance.
translation.zh: 我们还有两分钟就要上场了所以现在就是你的机会

translation.en: Oh, you're so nice.
translation.zh: 你人真好

translation.en: Now's your chance. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 要就趁现在哦

translation.en: Okay. Please don't make me regret this. Just go.
translation.zh: 好了 拜托别让我后悔 快去

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: I'm so sorry. Hi, I'm just, um…
translation.zh: 不好意思 嗨 我只是…

translation.en: I need to find someone, but, um, I… I don't wanna embarrass them.
translation.zh: 我需要找个人 但我不想让他们难堪

translation.en: So if you… if you hear my voice and you belong to me…
translation.zh: 所以如果你听到我的声音如果你属于我…

translation.en: I'm looking for my phone. Sorry, guys.
translation.zh: 我只是在找我手机 不好意思

translation.en: -Sorry, I'm looking for my phone. -[woman] Watch it!
translation.zh: -不好意思 我在找手机-看着点！

translation.en: [man] Yo, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 哟 你干嘛啊？

translation.en: You've got this. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你能行的

translation.en: She does not have this. She is not breathing, and she's paralyzed.
translation.zh: 她不行 她没在呼吸 她僵住了

translation.en: -I wanna go home. -[man 1] Seriously?
translation.zh: -我想回家-有没有搞错？

translation.en: -[man 2] Try and calm down, please? -[man 3] Grow up!
translation.zh: -试着冷静点 拜托-成熟点吧

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause, Katie, I love you ♪
translation.zh: 因为 凯蒂 我爱你

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: -Mom! -♪ All your loving ♪
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: Katie!
translation.zh: 凯蒂？

translation.en: Thank you. Katie?
translation.zh: 谢谢你 凯蒂？

translation.en: Oh, honey.
translation.zh: 哦 亲爱的

translation.en: I am so sorry. [sobbing]
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉

translation.en: You were right about this place. [sobbing]
translation.zh: 这地方 你说得对

translation.en: You are the best mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈你最棒

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: [Allison] Oh, I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: Honey. [cries]
translation.zh: 亲爱的

translation.en: We gotta follow that?
translation.zh: 我们要跟着唱这一出啊？

translation.en: I'm scared.
translation.zh: 我好怕

translation.en: Guys, relax.
translation.zh: 各位 放松

translation.en: Just go with it.
translation.zh: 配合就好

translation.en: I'm really sorry about what I said.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉我说了那些话

translation.en: Ugh, don't worry.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Worse has been said to moms.
translation.zh: 妈妈们听过更难听的话

translation.en: It's hard to let you grow up. [cries]
translation.zh: 我舍不得让你长大

translation.en: That's the truth.
translation.zh: 这是事实

translation.en: It's just hard for moms.
translation.zh: 做妈妈的都会不舍得

translation.en: It would've been way more fun to come with you anyway.
translation.zh: 反正和你一起来的话会更好玩

translation.en: -Really? [laughs] -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-对

translation.en: Well, I… I came anyway.
translation.zh: 我最后还是来了嘛

translation.en: Oh, my tears. They're gonna make my glitter fall off.
translation.zh: 哦 我的眼泪快把我的亮片都弄掉了

translation.en: Ugh, I spent about two hours putting this bedazzle on.
translation.zh: 这身闪亮亮的打扮可花了我约两小时

translation.en: Are you guys gonna help me finish this song or what?
translation.zh: 你们还打不打算帮我完成这首歌了？

translation.en: I think she's talking to you, Mom.
translation.zh: 她好像在跟你说话 妈

translation.en: -[Allison] No. -H.E.R. is calling you on stage.
translation.zh: -不-H.E.R.叫你上台

translation.en: -[chuckles] No. -You have to go.
translation.zh: -不-你必须去

translation.en: I was talking to both of you.
translation.zh: 我在跟你们俩说话呢

translation.en: Get up here.
translation.zh: 上来吧

translation.en: All of us?
translation.zh: 我们所有人吗？

translation.en: Just them, okay.
translation.zh: 只是她们哦 好吧

translation.en: Wanna do it?
translation.zh: 想上去吗？

translation.en: Yeah, let's do it.
translation.zh: 好 我们上去吧

translation.en: Sing it!
translation.zh: 唱吧！

translation.en: Go, Tasha!
translation.zh: 塔莎 你好棒！

translation.en: I'm by myself. Okay, cool.
translation.zh: 只剩我一人 好吧

translation.en: Wolfie, I love you, man!
translation.zh: 小狼 我爱你！

translation.en: Yeah, back at you!
translation.zh: 你也很棒哦！

translation.en: Be careful with those beakers. They're going back to school.
translation.zh: 小心那些烧杯 要归还给学校的

translation.en: Guys, I told you to take all that stuff out.
translation.zh: 各位 我让你们把这些东西都拿出去

translation.en: Take it out, now. All of it.
translation.zh: 通通拿出去 立刻马上

translation.en: And just keep, you know, scrubbing.
translation.zh: 你呀 给我继续擦洗

translation.en: No slacking off, okay? I see you.
translation.zh: 不准偷懒 我盯着你呢

translation.en: Whoa, Dad.
translation.zh: 哇 爸

translation.en: You became, like, a scary dad back there.
translation.zh: 你刚才变成了可怕的爸爸

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, I mean, that's…
translation.zh: 那个 我的意思是…

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta put your foot down,
translation.zh: 有时候你得强硬起来

translation.en: even with the ones you love, like you.
translation.zh: 即使是对自己爱的人 比如你

translation.en: No, it was pretty cool. I didn't know you actually had it in you.
translation.zh: 不 那挺酷的 我没想到你还有这一面

translation.en: [Carlos] Come here.
translation.zh: 过来吧

translation.en: -You're still grounded. You know that? -Oh, yeah, super grounded.
translation.zh: 你还是被禁足了 你知道吧？ 当然 跑不掉了

translation.en: You got the point. Hey, no slacking off.
translation.zh: 你知道就好 嘿 不准偷懒！

translation.en: The whole thing. The whole thing. The whole column. Go.
translation.zh: 整个 整个柱子都要擦 快擦

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [Allison] Hi, honey.
translation.zh: 嗨 亲爱的

translation.en: [chuckles] Hey! Oh, baby. I'm so glad you're okay.
translation.zh: 嗨 哦 宝贝 你没事真是太好了

translation.en: I wanna be a scientist, too, and blow things up.
translation.zh: 我也想成为科学家 然后搞爆炸

translation.en: -[Allison] You want to blow things up? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你想搞爆炸呀？-对

translation.en: It looks like you got a lot of practice tonight.
translation.zh: 看来你今晚做了不少练习嘛

translation.en: Nando, how could you let this happen?
translation.zh: 南多 你怎么能让这种事发生？

translation.en: You said you'd text if anything went wrong.
translation.zh: 你说过出事的话会给我发短信的

translation.en: How could you let this happen? You're the oldest, Katie.
translation.zh: 你怎么能让这种事发生？ 你是长女 凯蒂

translation.en: Everything they did while you were at that concert is your responsibility too.
translation.zh: 他们在你去演唱会时所做的一切也是你的责任

translation.en: I should ground you for twice as long as Nando.
translation.zh: 你的禁足期限应该是南多的两倍

translation.en: If it makes you feel better, I was worried sick the whole time.
translation.zh: 如果这么说能让你感觉好点我整晚都担心死了

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter, huh?
translation.zh: 有其母必有其女 是吧？

translation.en: Now help your brother clean.
translation.zh: 去帮你弟弟清理吧

translation.en: It's not so bad being the bad guy.
translation.zh: 当坏人其实也没那么糟

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Is it crazy I'm already looking forward to our next Yes Day?
translation.zh: 我已经开始期待下一个有求必应日了是不是很疯狂？

translation.en: No, no, no, the day is not over yet. I still have one more thing I wanna do.
translation.zh: 不 这一天还没结束 我还有一件事想做

translation.en: Hashtag, "Winning."
translation.zh: #我赢了

translation.en: I cannot believe you stole this gorilla.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信你偷了这只大猩猩

translation.en: She didn't steal it. She won it square and fair.
translation.zh: 可不是偷来的是她正正堂堂赢回来的

translation.en: Square and fair. I did.
translation.zh: 正正堂堂 没错

translation.en: -My turn. -[Katie] Thank you, Mom.
translation.zh: -轮到我了-谢谢你 妈

translation.en: -[Carlos] Why can't I get my feet? -[Allison] Carlos, come on.
translation.zh: -我为什么碰不到我的脚啊？-卡洛斯 加油

translation.en: -Right on my face. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 砸中我的脸了

translation.en: Nando, why do I feel like you're gonna break my nose?
translation.zh: 南多 我怎么觉得你会砸伤我的鼻子？

translation.en: That's the only thing I haven't broken today.
translation.zh: 那是我今天唯一没伤到的东西

translation.en: -[kisses] -I love you, Mama.
translation.zh: 我爱你 妈咪

translation.en: I love you, baby.
translation.zh: 我爱你 宝贝

translation.en: [Carlos] Nando, are you sure you got rid of all the catalyst?
translation.zh: 南多 你确定你把所有的催化剂都扔了？

translation.en: [Nando] Yep. I flushed it down the toilet.
translation.zh: 对 我都冲进马桶了

translation.en: -[Carlos] What? -[Ellie] What's that sound?
translation.zh: 什么？ 那是什么声音？

translation.en: [Allison] I hope that's rain.
translation.zh: 我希望那是雨声

translation.en: [Ellie] Mama, look! More foam!
translation.zh: 妈咪 你看！更多泡沫！

translation.en: -[Nando] Whoops. -[Katie gasps] Oh no!
translation.zh: -糟了-天啊 不！

translation.en: [Allison and Carlos] Nando!
translation.zh: 南多！

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause today's gonna be my day ♪ ♪ I just wanna climb ♪
translation.zh: （改编自艾米克劳斯罗森塔尔和汤姆利希腾赫德的小说）

translation.en: -Ah. Ah. -[Nando] Three! -Ow! Ow! -[Nando] Two! [Nando] One!
translation.zh: -三、二、一！-不要！

translation.en: Nando, why?
translation.zh: 南多 为什么呀？

translation.en: I didn't sign up for this!
translation.zh: 我来这里不是被欺负的！

translation.en: They'll never catch me.
translation.zh: 他们永远抓不到我

translation.en: I'm like a gazelle!
translation.zh: 我轻盈敏捷 犹如羚羊！

translation.en: Yes Day forever!
translation.zh: 有求必应日万岁！
